question: Ku ntandikwa y’omwaka gw’essomero, omusomesa w’abaana abato ayagala okukebera ekigendererwa kino okuva mu somo ly’Ennimi z’Obuyiiya: “Okulaga okwagala mu mawulire nga okuyita mu ngeri ez’enjawulo, gamba ng’okwogera nga omwana omuto, ebikolwa, okumwenya, n’ebirala.” Ngeri ki esinga okuba entuufu okukozesa okukebera embeera eno?
answer_a: Muwe abaana ffuluti ne kalirimba, mulinde era mulabe bwe bazikozesa.
answer_b: Leeta ebiseera ebitali bimu eri abaana, bikube era obireke babeere nabyo.
answer_c: Laga abaana ekintu ekireeta eddoboozi, oluvannyuma okibikke n'olugoye era obalindirire okukinoonya.
answer_d: Laga abaana ebifaananyi eby’enjawulo eby’ensolo ezifuyibwa mu maka basobole okukola ebivuga ebyazo.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekitongole eky’okutaano ayagala abayizi be okumanya, nga basinziira ku nteekateeka, ennyimba eziri mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Kiki ekikolwa ekisaanira abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino waggulu?
answer_a: Kola olukalala lw'ennyimba nga lwesigamiziddwa ku bubaka obuggyiddwa mu kubuuza.
answer_b: Noonya omutwe ogukwata ku nnyimba z'omu bibuga n'engeri gye zikolera ku bantu ba leero.
answer_c: Zzimba oba ovvuunule ennyimba ezimanyiddwa okuva mu lutalo lw'abavubuka olw'enjawulo olubakiikirira.
answer_d: Kola okunoonyereza ku baliraanwa bo era okuŋŋaanye amawulire agakwata ku ngeri z'ennyimba ezisinga okusiimwa mu kitundu kyammwe.

question: Ku mirimu gy’okukebera egikolebwa nga tebannazimba kifo we bagenda okuteeka ebintu byabwe, kiki ku bino wammanga ekiyinza okuyamba abayizi okumanya omutindo gw’ebyo bye batuuseeko mu pulojekiti zaabwe?
answer_a: Basiima, nga bayita mu mboozi, obubonero bw’emirimu gyabwe, nga bannyonnyola olulimi olw’ebyobulabi olutegekeddwa.
answer_b: Bakebera emirimu gyabwe, nga balondoola engeri endowooza zaabwe, ebintu bye bakozesezza, n'olulimi olw'ebyobuwangwa bye baalonze bwe bikwatagana.
answer_c: Balaga ebintu ebikozesebwa mu by'obugubi eby'abakugu ab'omulembe guno era obigerageranye n'ebyo ebirondoolwa mu pulojekiti zaabwe.
answer_d: Bayiga ku pulojekiti z’okuteekawo ebintu ezikolebwa mu matendekero amalala era ne bazikenenula nga basinziira ku ndabika y’ennimi ezikozesebwa.

question: Abaana abato mu myaka gyabwe egy’obuto beenyigira mu ssanyu mu mulimu omukubiriziddwa omusomesa. Bwe bawulira oluyimba, balina okutegeera ekivuga ekikubiddwa mu luyimba olwo era bayimuse kaadi eriko ekifaananyi ky’ekivuga ekyo. Kintu ki ku lulimi lw’ebivuga omusomesa ky’akolako mu bumanyirivu bw’okuyiga obunnyonnyolwa?
answer_a: Okukuba
answer_b: Omutindo
answer_c: Enzivuunulo y'eddoboozi
answer_d: Obukulu

question: Soma omulimu oguddako: Omusomesa w'ebivuga akulembera okukung'aanya mu kibiina okw'ekivvulu ky'abayimbi babiri abeesimbyewo n'ekibiina ky'abavuzi b'ebivuga. Mu kukung'aanya kuno, ayita abayizi okwawula ennyiriri z'amaloboozi ez'omuyimbi omu omu era balowooze nti ebivuga byombi bikwatagana nga bwe biri mu kwogera. Kiki ekigendererwa ekikulu eky'omulimu ogwo?
answer_a: Ddamu okukozesa okuwulira okw'omunda
answer_b: Kubiriza okusiima obulungi bw’ebintu.
answer_c: Kola okunoonyereza okw'omutindo gw'ebizimbe
answer_d: Kulaakulanya ennyonyoza y'omubiri.

question:
Soma embeera eno wammanga:
Omusomesa ayagala okutegeka essaawa ez’ebika by’amasomo ku mutwe gw’ekigambo “Omuyimbi: ebiwandiiko n’okuyimba”. Essomero gy’akolera lisangibwa ku nkengera z’ekibuga.
Kika kya muyimbi ki ky’asaanidde okutandika nakyo, okusobola okulaga nti omutwe guno gwe guli mu muyimbi abayizi b’essomero lye bamanyi?
answer_a: Omutindo
answer_b: Ennyimba ezikozesebwa mu firimu
answer_c: Okuyimbira omutembi
answer_d: Omuyimbi gw'ebika

question: Mu ndagiriro z'ebintu by'omuziki ebigoberera, kiki ekisinga okuzibuwalira omuyizi okukitegeera mu kusooka ng'ayiga ebikwatagana n'omuziki mu masomero ag'omusingi?
answer_a: Enjawulo mu bunene bw'eddoboozi
answer_b: Enjawulo mu maloboozi
answer_c: Enkyukakyuka mu mita
answer_d: Enkyukakyuka mu sipiidi y'oluyimba

question: Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekikkiriza okukozesa omutegeki w'obubonero ng'obuyambi mu kuwandiika oluyimba?
answer_a: Londa enkyukakyuka ezitali mu bw согласии mu nnyimba ez'amaloboozi amangi.
answer_b: Longoosa ekigambo ky'omuyimbi ekyawandiikiddwa nga kisinziira ku kuwuliriza.
answer_c: Siriigi ennyiriri z'omuziki ogw'amaloboozi amangi, ng'ekyakukozesa mu kwegezaamu okuyimba/okukuba ebivuga.
answer_d: Okutegeera ebigendererwa oba enkyukakyuka ez’omulembe mu kaseera akatundu k’omuyimbi we kalongoosezebwa era ne kakubibwa.

question: Kiki ekikolwa ekisinga okusaana okukozesebwa mu kusomesa abayizi okusiima ebikujjuko by'abayimbi abataabimanyi nga tubaleetera okusiima obukodyo omuyimbi bw'akozesezzaamu?
answer_a: Laga ebitundu ebikola ekitundu eky'okuwuliriza.
answer_b: Laba ebifaananyi by'obutonde bw'ensi ng'owuliriza.
answer_c: Wandiika olukalala lw'ebivuga ebiri mu kuwuliriza.
answer_d: Kuba langi ng'okozesa emibalanguzi n'ebizimbulukusa okukwataganya ebiseera eby'enjawulo eby'okuwuliriza.

question: Lowooza ku mbeera eno: Mu kitundu ekigamba ku "Omuyimbi n'obulamu bw'eddoboozi erimwetoolodde", omusomesa w'ebiyimba asaba abayizi be, ng'omulimu gw'ewaka, okwennyonnyoza ku ngeri eddoboozi, oluyengo olw'amaanyi (ultrasound), n'oluyengo olutali luwulirwa (infrasound) gye bikozesebwaamu okujjanjaba n'okukosa. Kiki omusomesa ky'ayagala okutuukako ng'akozesa omulimu guno?
answer_a: Okunoonya engeri n’ebika by’okufulumya eddoboozi
answer_b: Okusobozesa abayizi okusemberera obulungi bw’ebiwulire ebiri mu butonde.
answer_c: Okutegeera olutenga lw'amaloboozi abantu lwe bawulira.
answer_d: Okusobozesa abayizi be okumanya obungi bw'ebintu ebikwata ku maloboozi.

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kkiruwa ekisaanira okukozesebwa okukebera omutindo gw’omuyizi mu kwegatta kw’ebyo by’ayize mu by’omuyimbi n’ebitundu ebirala eby’obuwangwa?
answer_a: Kola okwewandiika kw'ebiseera ng'okozesa obubonero bw'emikono obwa solfège.
answer_b: Kuba emiziki egy’enjawulo (polyrhythms) ng’okozesa ebitundu by’omubiri.
answer_c: Kuba ennyimba nga okukozesa akakodyo ka "Omuyimbi mu Bbala"
answer_d: Weekgere okwegattika kw'agogics okuyita mu kwetereeza kw'emibiri gy'abayizi.

question:
Nga tukolera wamu n'abayizi ku kigendererwa: 'Okukozesa langi mu ngeri y'okusiiga ey'Abaimpressionist.'
Nsobi ki abayizi ze bakola ebisinga obungi bwe bagezaako okufuna langi ez'enjawulo mu mutabulo gwabwe?
answer_a: Gattika langi ey'ekitundu n'enziru okugifuula enziru ennyo
answer_b: Gattika langi y'ekitundu n'eyo egigizuuza okufuna ekisiikirize.
answer_c: Gattika langi ey'omubalanguzi n'eruusi okugyongera obweru
answer_d: Gabula langi emu enkulu n'endala enkulu okukola eya sekenda

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n'abayizi be ku mulamwa gw'ebiragiro by'ebbala. Mu kiseera ky'ekibiina, omu ku bayizi be amubuuza: "Mu bulamu obwa bulijjo, ddi ekibala ekiragiro lwe kikozesebwa?" Mu ngeri zino wammanga, lwaki olwo lukola ng'ekyokulabirako omusomesa ky'ayinza okuwa omuyizi we?
answer_a: Mu langi ezikozesebwa mu bukodyo bw'emikono obw'engoye, erangi ki efanaana n'erangi z'ebifo by'obutonde?
answer_b: Bwe mba nziriga era ne nnyoleseza embeera yange ey’obuntu okuyita mu langi.
answer_c: Bwe nkola ekiwooto ky'ekitabo
answer_d: Mu langi egatta era efuula, eky'okulabirako, olukalala lw'ebidduka okumanyika.

question: Omusomesa ayimiridde mu maaso g'ekibiina ng'ayogera ku mutwe gw'okukuba ebifaananyi, era omu ku bayizi be amubuuza: Kika ki kya kukuba bifaananyi ekiyitibwa intaglio era lwaki? Mu ngeri zino wammanga, lwaki waliwo olukusa omusomesa lw'ayinza okukozesa okwongera okutangaaza ekibuuzo ky'omuyizi?
answer_a: Okuyoola ebifananyi, kubanga omuti ogukolebwako kiyoolwa n’ebyuma eby’enjawulo ebisala era ne bikola obutimba obw’omunda mu muti ogukolebwako.
answer_b: Okukuba ebifaananyi nga okuyita mu mutimbagiro, kubanga bwetaatira ayita mu busera bw’olutimbe okukola ekifaananyi ku bintu nga olupapula, engoye, oba ebintu ebirala.
answer_c: Okuyoola n'okukuba ebifaananyi nga bakozesa amazzi, olw'okuba bwino aba yeesigadde mu tunyiro otuba twakoze mu kikaati ky'ekyuma, n'olwekyo, ekifaananyi ekikubiddwa kiva mu tunyiro tw'ekikaati so si ku ngulu kwakyo.
answer_d: Obuwandiike bwa lithography, olw’obuzito bw’ejjinja erikozesebwa, nga bugattiddwa ku bunene bw’amaanyi agasaanikiddwa ekyuma ekikuba ebifaananyi, butondekawo akabonero omubala gwe gweyoleka nga gulinnye waggulu katono.

question: Mu kibiina ekisookerwako, omusomesa ateekawo ekigendererwa: 'Okukulaakulanya obusobozi bw'okwetegereza, okwawula, n'okugatta ebintu ebirabika mu busangiro nga bayita mu kukuba ebifaananyi.' Okutuuka ku kino, omusomesa asaba abayizi okugenda ebweru mu butonde obuli okumpi n'essomero nga balina ebitabo byabwe eby'okukubisaamu ebifaananyi n'obbalaasi. Museeno ki ogw'ebikolebwa ogugenda okusobozesa abayizi okutuuka ku kigendererwa ekyatuukiddwaako?
answer_a: Londa ebintu ebikulu ennyo ebirabika mu mbeera y’obuntu era obikube, ng’okozesa ebicuুপuli ng’engeri y’okwolesaamu.
answer_b: Laba ebintu ebikwetoolodde, nonnyereza ku kifo ky'oyagala okusiiga, era olonde ebintu ebikulu n'enkula zaabyo by'oyagala okusiiga, oluvannyuma okole ekisiige ng'okozesa ekitangaala n'ekisiikirize.
answer_c: Laba ebifaayo mu kitundu, nnyonnyola ebintu ebikulu ebiri mu kifaananyi ky’olondodde, era okendeeze ku ndabika yabyo, ng’okozesa olukoloboze ng’engeri y’okwolesaamu endowooza yo.
answer_d: Gambalula ebintu ebikulu ebirabika mu mbeera y’obuntu era okyuse ennyanguyirizi ez’enjawulo ez’ekifo ekigenda okukiikirirwa mu katabo k’ebifaananyi.

question: Kiki ekisinga okusaana okukozesebwa okuyigiriza ku ndabika y’ebintu nga okubuuza ebirowoozo by’abayizi abali mu mutendera ogw’okukoppa ebintu eby’obutonde (emyaaka 12 okutuuka ku 14)?
answer_a: Saba abayizi okusiiga ekintu ekiri mu mbeera y'obuntu kyebalaba nga bayita mu ddirisa. Oluvannyuma, babagambe okwesamba eddirisa, basige ekintu kye kimu, era bageraageranye obunene obufuniddwa mu bifaananyi byombi.
answer_b: Saba abayizi okukoppa ekifaananyi ekirimu ebifo by’obutonde nga kiraga endowooza y’engeri ebintu gye birabikamu nga biri ewala nga kikoleddwa nga kikozesa obutonnyeze bubiri obubula, oluvannyuma obasabe okugeraageranya ekiwooto kyabwe n’ekifaananyi ekyakakolebwa, nga balowooza ku ndowooza y’engeri ebintu gye birabikamu nga biri ewala.
answer_c: Saba abayizi okusiiga omusale gw'ebbanga, okuteekawo obutonnyeze obubiri obubula, oluvannyuma basige ekikube era bageraageranye ebifaananyi eby'enjawulo ebibafunise ne bannaabwe mu kibiina.
answer_d: Basabye abayizi okuteekateeka omwoleso mwe banaannyonnyolera amateeka g’okukozesa olukoloboze lw’ebbanga nga basinziira ku bifaananyi bye baagala.

question: Omusomesa ali mukukola ku kitundu ekikwaata ku bifaananyi by’abantu n’abayizi mu kibiina eky’omusanvu. Okumaliriza ekitundu kino, agenda kubasaba okusiiga ekifaananyi kya munaabwe. Kiki abayizi kye balina okukola nga tebannatandika kukola kino?
answer_a: Kola okubala omuwendo ogw'oluse olugolokofu n'okukozesa enkola y'okusiiga ebisiige.
answer_b: Zzaawo ekitangaala n'ebisiikirize ebirabika ku maaso g'omuyizi munno.
answer_c: Koppa ebitundu by’obwenyi kinnoomu, gamba ng’ennyindo n’amatu.
answer_d: Loba ekifaananyi ky'obwenyi era otuule ebitundu byabwo mu ngeri entuufu.

question: Omusomesa akola ku kitundu kya Cubism n'abayizi be ab'ekibiina eky'omukaaga eraannyonnyola engeri endowooza gy'ekolebwamu. Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, gumu ki gusobola okukolebwa n'abayizi okukulaakulanya okutegeera ekintu ekyo?
answer_a: Kola akakonge nga okozesa ebitundu by'ebintu ebikiikiriddwa
answer_b: Kola kopi y'ekifaananyi ky'ekika kya analytical cubist ng'okyukakyusa langi.
answer_c: Kola omulimu ogw'okukoppa ebintu ebiriwo nga bikuumiddwa nga birina ebifo ebiwerako.
answer_d: Koppa ebifaananyi bya cubism nga okozesa empapula ez'ebiragala eby'enjawulo era nga za ngeri nnyingi.

question: Omusomesa atwala abayizi be mu ggwanika ly'ebyamazina okwetegereza ebifaananyi ebiragiddwa eby'obuwangwa n'ekigendererwa eky'okusiima omugaso gwabyo. Mu kiseera kino, omusomesa abawa akatabo akabalungamya okusobola okusiima obulungi bw'ebyo ebiragiddwa; balina okulonda ekifaananyi ekibasikiriza oluvannyuma baddemu ebibuuzo ebimu. Bibuuzo ki akatabo kano kye kirina okubaamu okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Omulamwa gw'omulimu guno gwe guki era guteereddwa mu mutendera ki? Okusiima kwo eri omulimu guno kwe kutya era lwaki?
answer_b: Omutonzi w'omulimu ye ani era ebikulu bye yakola mu bulamu bwe by'ebiri? Lwaki walonze omulimu guno? Ggwe gukwatagana gutya n'obulamu bwo?
answer_c: Omulimu guno gukoleddwa mu mutindo ki? Gukozesa enkola ennungamu ezikwatagana n'omutindo ogwo?
answer_d: Bintu ki ebiri mu bifaananyi ebikola omulimu gwe walonze ebisinga okweyoleka? Ebintu ebyo byoleka bitya ekigendererwa ky'omulimu ogwo?

question: Omusomesa akola ku kitundu: “Ebifaananyi by’abantu abamanyifu mu by’enfuna n’embeera z’abantu” ng’akola ebifaananyi eby’ebisenge bibiri; ku nkomerero y’enteekateeka, ayagala okukebera ekigendererwa: “Okufumiitiriza ku mirimu gy’ebifaananyi by’abantu abamanyifu mu by’enfuna n’embeera z’abantu ab’omulembe guno.” Kiraga ki ekikwatagana n’ekigendererwa ekyatuukiddwaako?
answer_a: Lambulula engeri ekifaananyi ky’akabonero k’omutindo gw’abantu abantu gye kikozesebwa mu kifaananyi kyabwe.
answer_b: Weekereza omutindo gw'okwekenneenya omulimu n'obuyinza bw'ekifaananyi ky'omuntu ow'ettutumu mu by'embeera z'abantu ekyolekeddwa.
answer_c: Alaga engeri gy’atwala ekifaananyi eky’omuntu ow’omugaso mu bantu ekyakolebwa muyizi munne.
answer_d: Annyonnyola engeri ye ng’omuntu gy’akoledde ekifaananyi ekikwata ku mbeera z’abantu.

question:
Omusomesa ow'ekitabo ky'abataano alaga abayizi be ebifaananyi bya Chile okuva mu biseera eby'enjawulo, ng'annyonnyola engeri ez'enjawulo abakugu gye bakozesaamu langi, enkula, n'omusana. Oluvannyuma, abasoomooza okulonda ekifaananyi, ekitali mu byo bye balabye, okwekkaanya kinnoomu ebintu bye bimu eby'olulimi olw'okulaba bye bayigiriziddwa. Ku nkomerero, abayizi baleeta okwekkaanya kwabwe mu kibiina. Omusomesa akola omulimu guno ng'akozesa akabonero.

Lwaki okukozesa enkola eno kisaanira okukebera ekigendererwa ekiragiddwa mu mulimu oguyise?
answer_a: Kubanga kizingiramu omulimu ogw'enjawulo ogulina ebitundu eby'enjawulo ebiteekwa okwawulwa okusobola okuwa omuyizi endowooza.
answer_b: Olw’ensonga nti olukalala lw’ebipimo lukiriza okugattika kw’obubonero n’enzitoya ez’enjawulo.
answer_c: Olw’okuba lulimi olukozesebwa lukusobozesa okukebera omulimu gw’omuyizi nga togutaddeko manki oba okusalirawo oba mulungi oba mubi, wabula okusinziira ku ngeri omuyizi gy’akolamu omulimu gwe.
answer_d: Olwa lubalaza olukiriza okulonda ebisinga obulungi okuva mu kunoonyereza okukoleddwa abayizi

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa alaga abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'omunaana akakwate k'engeri y'okukebera nayo bagenda okukozesa okukebera ekigendererwa kino: “Okunnyonnyola ebiriwo mu by'obulambuzi obw'omulembe guno, nga twetegereza engeri omutindo gwabyo gye guli, ebintu ebigakola, n'olulimi lwabyo olw'obulambuzi.” Ku ngeri zino wammanga, eruwa erimu akabonero akasaanidde okubaawo mu kakwate k'engeri y'okukebera?
answer_a: Enyinyonnyola engeri ebirowoozo bye biwoomereza omulimu gye biragibwa.
answer_b: Alaga okusiima kwe ku nkola ennyonnyofu ezaakozesebwa mu mulimu.
answer_c: Ennyonnyola enkolagana wakati w'emitendera gy'obuwaze, tekinologiya ezikozeseddwa okugikola, n'amakulu g'omulimu.
answer_d: Enyeesa ebintu eby'akabonero ebiri mu mulimu n'ebikwata ku bulamu bw'omuwandiisi.

question: Omusomesa bw’aba ayagala abayizi be okusobola okwawula ekiseera kya Baroque okusinziira ku ndabika y’ebintu, ku ki ky’asaanidde okussa essira okusinga?
answer_a: Enjawulo wakati w'ebika by'ennyimba eziyimbirwa n'ezikubibwa.
answer_b: Okutegeera okubaawo kwa basso continuo
answer_c: Okumanyisa abatutumufu abaakola ennyimba: Vivaldi, Bach, Haendel
answer_d: Okunnyonnyola ebintu eby'enjawulo ebyaliwo ebyatandika era ne bimaliriza ekiseera wakati wa 1600 ne 1750.

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kiki ekisinga okuyamba mu kuteekateeka olutambi lw'ebivuga bina nga lulina ebibinja by'ebivuga bisatu oba okusingawo ku buli ddoboozi?
answer_a: Okukoppa okusoma buli kitundu nga weekozesa engalo nga tofulumya ddoboozi.
answer_b: Okukuba ebifananyi eby'omuyindo ogwa buli layini
answer_c: Okukozesa awamu ebipimo by'ekiremu ky'ennyimba enkulu
answer_d: Omulimu ogw'okukuba ebivuga byonna awamu nga bikuba olunyiriri lwe lumu

question:
Soma omulimu oguddako:
Omusomesa alaga abayizi be vidiyo, ng’ebalaga ebintu ebikulu eby’enjawulo ebikolebwa mu mizannyo egy’ekizungu egya Renaissance n’emizannyo egya leero abayizi bennyini gye bazannya. Oluvannyuma, abasaba okugeraageranya emizannyo egiragiddwa mu vidiyo, nga beekenneenya ebintu eby’enjawulo ebikolebwa, gamba nga: engeri emizannyo gye gitegekeddwa, embeera mwe gizannyirwa, n’omugaso gwagyo.
Kigendererwa ki ekikulu omusomesa ky’agenderera okutuukako mu mulimu ogwo ogugambiddwa waggulu?
answer_a: Okutwala engeri ez’enjawulo omubiri gye gwolesebwa nga za muwendo.
answer_b: Okukubiriza okulambula obulungi ebirowoozo
answer_c: Okukulaakulanya okuwuliriza okwawula.
answer_d: Okubiriza okwegatta kw'ebivuga n'engeri endala ez'okweyoleka.

question:
Soma omulimu oguddako:
Okusobola okukwata ku kuyiga omugaso gw'ennyimba mu bulamu bw'abantu, abayizi bakola omulimu oguddako:
Mu bibinja, bagabana ennyimba ze baagala nga bannyonnyola era nga bawa obujulizi ku mugaso gw'ennyimba mu bulamu bw'abantu eri bannaabwe.
Omulimu guno gusobola gutya okwongerwako okuzimba okulambika okw'amaanyi ku mugaso gw'ennyimba mu bulamu bw'abantu?
answer_a: Okugeraageranya ebikwata ku ngeri y'okuyimba kwabwe
answer_b: Okunnyonnyola amakulu g'omulimu omutindo.
answer_c: Ng'okulaga emirimu gy'abantu mu kibinja.
answer_d: Okuyita mu kukwataganya engeri z'ennyimba n'engeri gye zikozesebwamu.

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Omusomesa w'ebyamuziki asaba abayizi be okukola omulimu gw'okukuba ebintu mu bibinja, omuli, okusooka, abasomesa olunyiriri lw'entuumo olw'akatikitiki akawungeezi, ate oluvannyuma, olunyiriri olw'okubiri. Omusomesa yeesomesa entuumo mu ngeri eno: 1. Abayizi bonna wamu bakuba olunyiriri olusooka; oluvannyuma olw'okubiri. 2. Ekitundu ky'ekibiina kikuba olunyiriri olusooka n'ekitundu ekirala olw'okubiri, bwe kityo ne kireetawo ennyimba ez'enjawulo. 3. Abayizi bonna mu kiseera kye kimu baddamu okukola omulimu ogwakakolebwa, naye kati mu bubiri. 4. Oluvannyuma, abayizi balondeddwa kinnoomu okukuba buli lunyiriri lw'ennyimba ez'enjawulo. Nkulaakulana ya ngeri ki esinga okukuzibwa omulimu ogwo oguguddwa waggulu?
answer_a: Okutegeera
answer_b: Ekibiina
answer_d: Obwongo n'omubiri

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kiseera omusomesa ng’annyonnyola ebika by’obubonero bw’ebiseera, akiraba nti abayizi be abasinga obungi tebasobola kuwulira njawulo wakati w’ebika by’obubonero bw’ebiseera ebirina omuwendo gw’obukuba bwe gumu naye nga byawukana mu mugawanyo (2/4 ne 6/8, 3/4 ne 9/8, 4/4 ne 12/8). Kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukola okuyamba abayizi okwawula enjawulo ezo?
answer_a: Weetebwa omuyizzi gw'ennyimba ogulaga enjawulo zino.
answer_b: Kyusa akabonero k'obudde aka melody ennyangu nga okukozesa omu kubambi akakola ebipande by'ennyimba.
answer_c: Mukoone oluyimba mu 6/8 n'abayizi, era amangu ddala nga mumaze, mukyuse akazimbulukusa kalyo okulukola mu 3/4.
answer_d: Okunnyonnyola engeri empalo gy’eyawulwamu mu bibiri n’ensatu nga tukozesa okumanya kw’abuyigirizwa kwe balina ku by’emikutule.

question: Mu kibiina, abayizi balina okwogera waggulu nga balaga olutalo lw'ennyimba. Kiki ekisinga okulaga obukugu abayizi bwe bakulaakulanya nga bakola kino?
answer_a: Okuwuliriza okwawula.
answer_b: Okutegeera eddoboozi
answer_c: Obwetegefu mu by'obukugu.
answer_d: Okuwuliriza n'obwegendereza

question: Kiki ekikolwa ky'okukebera ekisobozesa okukwataganya ekikolwa ky'obuyimbi n'ebitundu ebirala eby'obukugu?
answer_a: Enzirukanya y'ebitundu by'omubiri mu ntungo z'omuyimbi ezikwatagana n'okuwuliriza
answer_b: Abayizi baali bakuŋŋaanidde mu kizimbe ky’essomero ekikulu, nga buli omu yeetegefu okukuba ekivuga kye mu luyimba olw’okwesiga obusobozi bwe. Omusasi w’ebivuga yatuula ku mmeeza ng’amuteeze amatooki, era ng’amanyi bulungi omulimu oguli mu maaso ge. Omwana omu omu yagenda mu maaso, n’akwata ekivuga kye, era n’atandika okukuba oluyimba lwe. Abamu baakubye nnyimba zaabwe nga batidde, ate abalala nga beesiga obusobozi bwabwe. Omusasi w’ebivuga yawuliriza buli omu n’obwegendereza, ng’ateeka ebirowoozo bye ku ngeri buli omu gy’akubamu ekivuga kye. Bwe zaaggwa, omusasi w’ebivuga yalangirira abantu abaali bafunye obubonero obusinga obulungi.
answer_c: Kukuba ebivuga nga tukozesa ebintu ebikoleddwa obuggya, nga biva mu nnono z'abantu ez'enjawulo.
answer_d: Kukuba ebikolwa by'omuziki nga tukozesa engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okulaga omuziki mu ndabika.

question: Soma ebintu bino ebiraga omutindo gw'ebyo ebiri okukubirizibwa: - Okwagala okukulaakulanya okumanya, omukwano, n'essanyu mu mawulire n'ennyimba. - Okusiima engeri ez'enjawulo ennyimba gye ziragibwamu, embeera zaazo, endowooza, n'engeri ez'enjawulo nga zisinziira ku muntu yennyini. - Okwagala okutandikawo emikwano n'okugatta ennyimba n'ebintu ebirala eby'obuyiiya, amasomo, n'obulamu bwonna. Ebintu ebyo waggulu ebiraga omutindo gw'ebyo ebiri okukubirizibwa byolekera nnyo kukwatagana na nkola ki ezikwata ku kuyiga?
answer_a: Eyoleka
answer_b: Empisa
answer_c: Omutegeevu
answer_d: Okutegeera

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka okukolera awamu n'abayizi be ab'omwaka ogw'okubiri mu siniya ku pulojekiti ng'akozesa emiramwa gya Land Art. Mu biragiro bino wammanga, kiruwa ekisaanira okutandika nakyo omulimu guno?
answer_a: Teekawo omulimu mu bweru bw’essomero obutaliimu kintu kyonna, obwolesebwa eri enkyukakyuka z’obudde era ozikozese ng’ebintu eby’omugaso mu kyakuteekateeka.
answer_b: Teekateeka omulimu nga weekozesa ebintu eby'obutonde eby'enjawulo ebisangiddwa era okole n'akakodyo akaterekero mu kizimbe ky'essomero omutendekerwa emizannyo.
answer_c: Teekateeka omulimu nga weekozesa kazambi ava mu bibuga okukyusaamu ekifo munda mu kizimbe.
answer_d: Teekateeka omulimu ng'oyita mu bifaananyi okunyonyola ebifo eby'enjawulo ebiraga obulungi ensi yo.

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n’ekibiina ky’abayizi abali mu siniya ku mutwe gw’ekyokulabirako: “Omubiri ng’ekyakulabirako eky’okukozesa mu kukola ebintu” era ayagala okukebera ekigendererwa: “Okukozesa ennimi ez’enjawulo, obukodyo, n’engeri z’okutondeka eby’obuyiiya n’ebintu ebirabika.” Mu bintu bino ebiddirira, kirina kubeerawo ki mu mulamwa ogunaakebera ekigendererwa ekigambiddwa?
answer_a: Yimba ebifaananyi ebiraga omubiri ng'akakondo.
answer_b: Okukola okunoonyereza okw’ebyawandiikibwa ku birowoozo eby’enjawulo ebikwatagana n’omubiri ng’akakwate.
answer_c: Okukola ekikolelwa oba olubaawo lw’engoye olukwatagana n’ensonga y’omubiri ng’ekyakukwasiza.
answer_d: Okunoonyereza okw'obukugu ku bintu ebikozesebwa okukola olubaawo lw'engoye olw'ekyokulabirako

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n’abayizi be ku mulamwa gw’ebintu eby’obuwangwa ebiggumire ebigenda. Okwanguya okutegeera, abalaga ebifaananyi eby’enjawulo ebiraga omulamwa guno. Mu ngeri ki eno wammanga mulimu ekyokulabirako ekituufu eky’ebintu eby’obuwangwa ebiggumire ebigenda?
answer_a: Ebifaananyi bya ppaaka n'obukuumi bw'obutonde.
answer_b: Ebifaananyi by'amayumba agalangiriddwa ng'ebintu by'eggwanga eby'omuwendo omungi
answer_c: Ebintu eby'omu bintu by'obuwangwa obwa edda
answer_d: Engero n'ebifa ku mulembe ogw'okwogerera waggulu

question:
Soma embeera eno wammanga:
Omusomesa omuto ow’omwaka ogusooka mu Ssomero lya Middle ategekka omukolo abayizi be mwe bagenda okukolera ebifaananyi ebisiigwa ebweru butereevu, nga batwala omugendo gw’abayimbi aba Impressionist ng’ekyakulabirako.
Kuyiga ki okw’emabega, okwogeddwako ku nkola z’obuyimbi, kwe kwetaagisa abayizi bano okukola?
answer_a: Okukozesa obutonotono obutadde okumpi okukola emibalabala egy'emikye.
answer_b: Okukozesa langi ezitali za bulijjo ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebiri mu mbeera y'obuntu.
answer_c: Okukozesa langi eziriwo mu kitundu nga bweziri ng’omutendera ogusooka
answer_d: Okukozesa langi enzirugavu okukiikirira ebisiikirize

question: Omulundi ogusoose, abayizi b’omwaka ogusooka mu Siniya basoomozebwa okukozesa okubaja embawo ng’engeri y’okweyoleka. Okunnyonnyola tekiniki eno bw’eri, omusomesa akozesa ekyokulabirako okuva mu bulamu obwa bulijjo okukola olugero olufaanagana n’enkola y’okukola ekifaananyi ekibajiddwa. Ku ndagaano zino wammanga, eruwa erimu olugero oluyamba okunnyonnyola okubaja embawo kwe kwesigamiziddwa?
answer_a: Ekikubiddwa ku kyapa okuva mu kyapaayi y’essomero
answer_b: Akabonero akakubiddwa siteampu ya ssaabawandiisi ku ssomero
answer_c: Engalo z’omuntu eziri ku kaadi y’omuyizi eraga obuntu bwe
answer_d: Ebipimo by'engatto z'abayizi ku ffloowa y'ekibiina.

question:
Omusomesa akozeseza ekikozesebwa okukebera okusobola okukebera omwana bw'akoze vidiyo eya "Stop Motion".
Mu bintu bino ebiri wansi, kiki ekiraga nti abayizi bategeera bulungi omulingo ogukozesebwa mu kutondeka vidiyo eno nga bakozesa obukodyo obw'enjawulo obukozesebwa mu tekiniki eno?
answer_a: Akola ebifananyi eby'ebintu oba abantu, n'abissa mu mulimu ogw'okubanga emboozi ng'akozesa katuni.
answer_b: Akuba ebifaananyi by’ebintu oba abantu mu ngeri etali ya kuleka, ng’akyusa obutono ku ngeri gye bateekeddwamu.
answer_c: Okukwata ebifananyi eby'enjawulo nga bikozesebwa empiso z' kamera ez'enjawulo.
answer_d: Ayanjula vidiyo yaabwe mu nkola ey'omukutu ogwa digito nga yakozesebwa ebifaananyi bya firimu eby'enjawulo

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu by'emiziki, omusomesa w'abaana abato ateekateeka omukolo okukolera ku bintu by'emiziki eby'enjawulo. Omulimu ogusooka gwetaagisa abaana okuwuliriza eddoboozi eriva mu ttappo eritonnya era oluvannyuma baliddemu nga bakuba engalo. Ekiddako, balina okuddamu omulimu nga bawuliriza okutikka kw'essaawa. Kintu ki ku lulimi lw'emiziki ekikolebwako mu mukolo ogwo?
answer_a: Okukuba kw'omutima
answer_b: Olulimi
answer_c: Obungi bw'ebiro
answer_d: Obukulu

question: Kiki ekikolwa ekikiikirira obuzibu obw’amaanyi mu by’obukugu eri omuyizi ayiga okukuba keyboadi ey’amasannyalaze?
answer_a: Okukuba oluyimba n'ebbaasi
answer_b: Okuzannya n'enjawulo ezikyuka
answer_c: Okuzannya nga ogenda mpolampola
answer_d: Okukuba oluyimba olwa arpeggio n'omukono ogwa kkono

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Mu kibiina ky’abaana ab’ekitabo ekya 5/6 mu pulayimale, omusomesa w’ebyamuziki ayita abayizi okukozesa ekifo ky’ekisulo okutambulatambula nga bawuliriza oluyimba olw’eggwaatiro. Basabiddwa okulaga obungi bw’ebikuba n’ebisisimula bye basobola okutegeera nga bakozesa emibiri gyabwe. Oluvannyuma, mu bibinja, bakkiriziganya ku ngeri y’okutambula okwolesa ebisisimula by’oluyimba: kiyinza okuba okukutama, okuyimusa omukono, n’ebirala. Bawuliriza oluyimba ate era buli kibinja kyakola omulimu gwakyo kinnoomu abantu bonna basobole okulabagana. Kiki ekikozesebwa okukebera omusomesa ky’asaanidde okukozesa okukakasa nti abayizi bategeera ebintu ebikola olulimi lw’ebyamuziki?
answer_a: Omutindo gw'okukebereza
answer_b: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa
answer_c: Ekiwandiiko ekikwata ku mbeera y'omuyizi.
answer_d: Omutindo gw'okupima

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Omusomesa mu kibiina kya 5/6 akola enteekateeka erimu ebitundu bisatu ebigenda bigaziya, n’ekigendererwa ky’okukulaakulanya mu bayizi be okuwuliriza okwawula n’okuyiga okusoma n’okuwandiika ebikwata ku miziki.
1. Ekitundu ekisooka mu nteekateeka eno kye kya kukola bifaananyi eby’obwereere ebigezako okukiikirira ebivuga ebivugiddwa okuva mu kuwuliriza n’engeri gye bikolamu.
3. Ekitundu ekyokusatu kye kya bayizi okugoberera ennyimba ennyangu, ezirina ebipimo bitono n’enkola ennyangu.
Kiki ekikolwa ekiyinza okuteekebwawo ku kitundu ekyokubiri oba eddaala ly’enteekateeka eno?
answer_a: Soma ekkaati y'endongo
answer_b: Soma empandiika y'oluyimba.
answer_c:
Omutwe: ________________________________________________________________

      1. Obukakafu obuwagira

III. Enkomerero:

answer_d: Londa ekifaananyi kya Venn

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’omukaaga, mu mutwe ogw’enyimba za Latin America, ayagala okukozesa Ekigendererwa kino eky’Okuyiga n’abayizi: ‘Okutondekawo n’okuyiiya ennyimba nga bakozesa obumanyirivu n’okumanya okwesigamiziddwa ku biragiro ebiweereddwa.’ Ku biraga byonna ebiri wansi, kiraga ki ekisobola okukozesebwa okukebera ekigendererwa ekyo waggulu?
answer_a: Bakola empalirizo z'omuyilo ogw'ennyimba ogwa bulijjo ogw'ekika ky'ennyimba eky'enjawulo.
answer_b: Ban ব্যাখ্যা instrumental ne vocal ez'enjawulo nga bagoberera enkozesa y'ebipande ebitegerekeka obulungi.
answer_c: Bagattira ennyimba nga bakozesa ebivuga bye beetondedde, nga bagoberera sikoozi.
answer_d: Bagattira ennyimba ez'omulembe nga bakozesa ebitundu by'omubiri, nga bategeka engeri y'entereeza y'ebitendero by'enyimba bwe baagala.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa w'ebyamuziki mu kibiina kya 6, mu mutwe "Omuyimbi ow'ekikugu", ayagala okukola omulimu ogusobola okukulaakulanya ekigendererwa kino wammanga: "Okulaga, nga balaga obukugu obweyongera n'obunnyikivu, engeri gye bawuliramu, ebirowoozo, n'endowooza eziweebwa omuziki oguwulirwa era ogukolebwa, nga bakozesa engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okwolesa (ez'olulimi, ez'omubiri, ez'omuziki, ez'amaaso)". Mulimu ki ogukolebwa abayizi ogutuukana n'ekigendererwa ekiri waggulu?
answer_a: Muzzukuseemu ebimu ku bintu ebiragiddwa mu katemba akamanyiddwa ennyo nga mumaze okuwuliriza oluyimba olukolerwa akatemba ako.
answer_b: Kiwandiike ekitundu ekiraga embeera y'obuwulize okusinziira ku ky'okulimba.
answer_c: Tegeka emisongeko gy'amazina egiraga enkyukakyuka mu birowoozo ebibaawo oluvannyuma lw'okuwuliriza oluyimba.
answer_d: Kombaatira obutundutundu bw'ennyimba obulaga enneewulira oba embeera ebaayo mu buli katundu akali mu firimu.

question: Lowooza ku mbeera eno: Omusomesa mu kibiina kya musanvu ayagala okukulaakulanya okuyiga okukwata ku bintu ebyeyoleka, naddala amaanyi n’enjogera. Kumanya ki abayizi kwe balina okuba nakwo okusobola okutuuka ku kuyiga ng’okwo?
answer_a: Okusoma okw'ekitendero
answer_b: Okusoma okw'oluyimba
answer_c: Ebipimo by'amaloboozi
answer_d: Okukuba ebivuga by'omuziki

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa mu kibiina ky'omunaana mu somero ateekateeka omutwe ogugenda okusomesa ogwa 'Enkola z'Okukulaakulanya Omuziki'. Kintu ki abayizi kye balina okuba nga bamanyi okusobola okutegeera ebiri mu mutwe guno ogugenda okusomesebwa?
answer_a: Enjawulo
answer_b: Omulembe gw'amaloboozi
answer_c: Omutwe gw'oluyimba
answer_d: Okukulakulanya oluyimba

question:
Soma embeera eno wammanga:
Omusomesa mu kibiina kya munaana, mu mutwe "Abakompoza abakugu", ayagala abayizi be bakulakulanye okuwuliriza okw'amaanyi n'ebitabo bya Ludwig van Beethoven. Okukola kino, balina okukola omulimu ogugatta omuziki n'okweyoleka kw'omubiri.
Kiki ekikozesebwa ekisinga okusaana okukozesebwa okukebera obuyigirize mu kweyoleka, okunnyonnyola, n'obutondefu mu bitundu byombi n'entabaganya wakati waabyo?
answer_a: Omutemwa gw'ebikole by'omuyizi
answer_b: Omutindo gw'okukebera
answer_c: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa
answer_d: Ekipimo ky'okukebereza

question: Omusomesa yakolera wamu n’abayizi mu kibiina eky’okutaano ku busobozi bw’okuyimba nga basoma ennyimba. Oluvannyuma lw’emyaka esatu, omusomesa yakomawo okusomesa ekibiina kye kimu ky’abayizi, kati nga bali mu kibiina eky’omunaana, era ateekateeka okukolera ku bigambo bye bimu n’obukugu bwe bumu: okuyimba nga basoma ennyimba. Musingi ki ogw’enkola ogukwatagana n’ekitongole ky’olulimi lw’ebivuga omusomesa gw’akozesa?
answer_a: Omukwatane: okusobola okuleetawo okuyiga, ekitundu ky'omuziki ekitegeerekeka kirina okukwataganyizibwa n'obukugu.
answer_b: Okutemaatema: Ekitundu ky'omuziki ekikulu kigabanyizibwamu obutundutundu obutonotono obukolerwako kinaddimu.
answer_c: Okuddamuza: ekitundu ky'olulimi lw'ennyimba kye kimu kireetebwawo omulundi oguddako ku mutendera ogweyongera obuzibu.
answer_d: Okuddamu: Ekitundu ky'omuziki kye kimu kiba kirina okukolebwako emirundi egiwerako, okusooka nga tuyita mu kigezo ate oluvannyuma nga tusoma.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu lugendo lw'okusoma olw'ekibiina ky'abaana abali mu mwaka ogw'omukaaga okugenda mu materekero g'ebintu eby'edda agali wabweru, abayizi bagenda okulaba ebifaananyi ebyakolebwa ku bisenge nga bali wamu n'abalungamya n'abasomesa baabwe. Oluvannyuma, mu kibiina ekiddako, omusomesa abasaba okusiiga ekifaananyi ekyabakwata omwoyo ennyo olw'ebintu ebiragibwa n'ensonga lwaki kyali kyakukwatiriza. Ku nkomerero y'ekibiina, omusomesa akuŋŋaanya ebifaananyi okubyekenneenya. Okusinziira ku bifaananyi ebyasiigiddwa abayizi, nkola ki omusomesa gy'ayinza okukozesa okukulembera abayizi mu kwekenneenya ebifaananyi ebyo?
answer_a: Laga ebifaananyi by'abayizi bye bakubye era otandiseewo okwogera ku lulimi lw'ebifaananyi n'ebigendererwa eby'okweyoleka abayizi bye balaze.
answer_b: Buuza abayizi ebibuuzo ebikwata ku ndowooza y’olulimi olw’obuwangwa n’ekigendererwa eky’okwolesa mu kubajja ebifananyi ku bisenge, okutandikawo okwogera okw’ekibiina.
answer_c: Waayo, leero tugenda kwetaba mu lugendo olw’obuyiiya okuyiga ku by’emizigo nga tukozesa ebifaananyi ebyakolebwa abakugu abamanyiddwa. Tugenda okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw’olulimi olw’ebifaananyi mu kwoleka ebirowoozo n’enneewulira.
answer_d: Laga ebifaananyi by'ebisenge ebyakyaliddwa era onyonyole abayizi omukwano wakati w'ebirowoozo, olulimi olw'amaaso, n'embeera mwe biteereddwa.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina eky’omukaaga, mu mutindo gw’essomo ‘Obutonde bw’ebyamazina: ebyamazina ebyomulembe guno’, omusomesa awa abayizi be ekigendererwa kino: ‘Okukola ekifananyi eky’ebintu nga basinziira ku kusiima ennyiriri z’ebyomulembe guno ezirabika obulungi’. Mu nkola zino wammanga, nzirukanya ki eyinza okukozesebwa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Noonyereza ku bikwata ku lukoloboze lw'ebifaananyi eby'omulembe ogw'ekikugu (objectual painting) okuva eri omu ku batandisi baalyo; kola ekifaananyi ekikopi ng'okozesa langi eya akuliliki (acrylic) eky'omukozi w'ebifaananyi gwe wanoonyerezzaako.
answer_b: Soma ebikolwa by'obuyiiya ebikozesa ebintu ebirala; kola ekikolwa ky'obuyiiya ekikozesa ekintu ky'onoonyezza mu bulamu bwo obwa bulijjo.
answer_c: Laba ebifaananyi eby'ebintu; londa engeri zaabyo enkulu olw'omulimu gw'ekibiina.
answer_d: Gambawola ebikolwa by'okusiiga ebintu era ogerageranye emitwe gy'ebyogerwako n'ebintu ebiraga olulimi olw'okulaba.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu kibiina eky’omukaaga, mu mutwe gw’ekyogerwako ‘Okutondekawo ebintu ebirabika, omuntu n’obutonde’, omusomesa ayogerera ku kiruubirirwa kino: ‘Okutondekawo omulimu ogulabika nga gyesigamiziddwa ku birowoozo by’abayizi, nga tukozesa ebintu ebitakosa butonde’. Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, gumu ku gino gw’osobola okukozesa okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa omusomesa ky’ateekawo?
answer_a: Kola ekifaananyi eky’ekibajjo ekya kiragala ekiraga ebyo by’oyagala.
answer_b: Kola ekisimbe ky'omuti ekikiikirira empisa yo esinga obukulu.
answer_c: Zimba ekibumbe nga okozesa "papier-mâché" nga kisinziira ku mulamwa gw'obucaafu.
answer_d: Kola omubalaza nga weekozesa ebintu ebikozeseddwa dda, ogukubiriza abantu okukozesa ebintu ebyo mu ssomero.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa omusomesa ebibiina bya 6 ayigiriza omutindo gwa xylography. Alaze ebyokulabirako eby’enjawulo era n’annyonnyola enkola y’okubajja n’okukuba ebifaananyi eri abayizi be. Ng’akozesa okumanya kuno, abalagira okusiiga ekifaananyi ekisoboka okukolebwa wansi w’ebiranga by’omutindo guno ogw’okusiiga. Bw’atandika okutalaaga ekisenge okulaba engeri abayizi gye bakulaakulanaamu, akiraba nti ebifaananyi ebimu birimu ebigambo. Omusomesa ayimiriza ekibiina, atwala ekimu ku bifaananyi bino ng’ekyokulabirako era n’annyonnyola ekigenda okubaawo ng’ekigambo kibajjiddwa mu matrix nga bwe kiri mu kifaananyi. Kiki eky’obuyigiriza ekiyinza okukulembera abayizi okukola obulungi print matrix?
answer_a: Yingiza ekifananyi ku matiriksi ng'okozesa olupapula olwa kaboni.
answer_b: Laga engeri empandiika y’ekifananyi ekyole (xylograph) gy’ekolebwa okulaga ekituukiddwaako mu kwola.
answer_c: Teeka endabirwamu ku kikopo ekibalanguzebwa ekifaananyi kirabike nga kikyusiddwa.
answer_d: Ku lubaale, kubalaata, ssaawaati ebbaluwa okunyonyola engeri endagaano z’obuziba gye zikolebwamu.

question: Mu kibiina kya 6, ku ntandikwa y’essomo ly’okubaja, omusomesa mu ssaawa esooka awa abayizi omulimu guno: lowooza ku byo obajja byo era obisiige mu katabo ko ak’ebifaananyi. Oluvannyuma, abasaba okuleeta ebintu gamba nga glue, ekintu kwe bakolera, ebikuta ebikozeseddwa, n’ebintu eby’obutonde n’ebikolebwa ebitali bimu mu ssaawa eddako. Mu ssaawa eyokubiri, nga bakolera mu bibinja, abayizi balina okuzimba ekifananyi ekitonotono n’ebintu ebyasabiddwa, okusobola okutuukiriza ebirowoozo byabwe. Ssaawa eyokubiri etuukana ku mutendera ki ogw’ekigerageranyo ekikyuka eky’enkola ey’obuyiiya?
answer_a: Okwegezaamu
answer_b: Pulani
answer_c: Yanjula era ogabane
answer_d: Lowooza era omufulumize ebirowoozo

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Abayizi okuva mu kibiina eky’omukaaga batandika omutendera ogugenderera “Okukulaakulanya okusiima obulungi bw’ebintu ebirabika.” Okukola kino, bakolera mu bubiri nga balambula emikutu gya yintaneeti egy’amaterekero g’ebintu eby’omulembe, balonda omulimu era banoonya ebikukwatagana nagwo. Okusobola okubalungamya mu kunoonyereza, omusomesa abawa omulandira gw’ebikolebwa mu mitendera esatu. Mu milandira gino wammanga, ogumu gwokka gwe gusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyatuukiddwaako?
answer_a: Gambawola ekifaananyi; londa ebintu by'olulimi olw'okulaba; kebejja enkula yaakyo n'ebikirimu.
answer_b: Lowooza ku ndabika yaakyo n'ebikirimu; keelereza ebintu eby'olulimi olw'amaaso; nnyonnyola ekifaananyi.
answer_c: Nnyonnyola endabika n'ebirimu ebiri mu kifaananyi, lowooza ku bintu ebikozesebwa mu lulimi lw'okulaba; manya ebifa ku bulamu bw'omukubi w'ebifaananyi.
answer_d: Manya ebifa ku bulamu bw'omukubi w'ebifaananyi; keenennya enkula n'ebiri munda; tegeera ebintu eby'olulimi olw'okulaba.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana atandika omutwe "Okutondeka ebirabika, omuntu n’obutonde". Mu kibiina, abayizi bayiga ku mukutu gw’ebyembiro ogwa "Land art" nga bayita mu bikolwa eby’enjawulo, oluvannyuma beekute mu bibinja okutonda ekintu nga basinziira ku mukutu guno ogw’ebyembiro. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki ey’emirimu gy’eba esinga okuba entuufu okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’omutwe guno?
answer_a: Kozesa ebintu eby'obutonde okukola ebintu ebirina obunene.
answer_b: Weetegereze ebintu eby'omulembe gw'ebyemikono era okole ekifananyi nga by'osinziirako.
answer_c: Tegeka enkozesa n'endabika y'ebintu eby'obutonde era obiyingize mu kifo.
answer_d: KENNONA enkola z’okusiimattira ebintu nga tukozesa ebintu eby’obutonde era weerabiremu obukulu bwazo mu kutondekawo omulimu gw’obukulembeze.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina kya mukaaga mu ssomero erito, mu somo ly' "Okukuba ebifaananyi", omusomesa ayagala abayizi be bakole ebifaananyi eby'omulembe ogumu (monotypes). Kiki abayizi kye balina okuba nga baakayiga dda okusobola okukulaakulana mu kukola ebifaananyi eby'omulembe ogumu (monotypes)?
answer_a: Okukozesa n'okukwata akatimba mu nkola y'okukwata ebintu (emulsification)
answer_b: Okutonda n'okukola emirimu egy'omulandira
answer_c: Kozesa era olage engeri gy'owuliramu ng'oyita mu lunyiriri.
answer_d: Okukwata n'okukola ebiwundu nga tukozesa ebikozesebwa eby'enjawulo

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu kibiina eky'omunaana, mu mutindo gw'ekitundu "Okutondeka ebirabwa, omuntu n'obutonde", abayizi bakola omulimu gw'ekibiina ogw'okukwata vidiyo ku mbalama ku mbalama ku butonde bwabwe. Okutandika okukyusa vidiyo, omusomesa yeetaaga okukakasa oba bamalirizza emirimu egiyise, gamba nga okukola sitooliboodi, okukwata vidiyo ennyimpi mu butonde ku nsonga eyo, n'okuwandiika ebiwandiiko ebikwatagana ne vidiyo, ebigenda okuteekebwa mu mulimu gwabwe ogw'okukwata vidiyo. Mu bintu ebikozesebwa okukebera ebiwandiiko bino wammanga, kiki ekisaana okukakasa oba emirimu gino gyakomekkerezebwa?
answer_a: Omutemwa gw'ebikole by'omuyizi
answer_b: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa
answer_c: Omukwanaganyo gw'ebipimo ogw'okwekenneenya
answer_d: Ekiwandiiko ekikwata ku mbeera y'omuyizi.

question: Mu kibiina kya munaana, mu mutindo gw'essomo "Okukola Ebintu n'Obutonde," omusomesa awaayo ekigendererwa kino: "Kola ebifaananyi by'ebintu ebiraga nti wasinziira ku butonde." Ku mirimu egikozesebwa okukebera omuyizi oba atuuse ku kigendererwa ekyo, kkiruwa ekisobozesa omusomesa okukakasa nti omuyizi atuuse ku kigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Laba engeri ennyonyi n’ennyanguyirizi gye bikwatagana, oteeketeeke akabonero akalaga engeri empisa n’entegeka yaabyo gye bikwatagana.
answer_b: Longooseza ebintu byobutonde ebirimu obutebenkevu, era okole omulimu ogulaga enkolagana entuufu n'ebintu eby'omulembe.
answer_c: Weekka ebintu ebyakolebwa nga byesigamiziddwa ku butonde, era okole olutalo lw'ebiseera olulaga enkyukakyuka ze bikoleddwamu okuva lwe byatondebwa okutuuka kati.
answer_d: Weetegereze omukwano oguli wakati w'ebintu ebikolebwa n'obutonde, oteeketeeke ekintu ekikopya enkula oba engeri y'ekintu ekiri mu butonde.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina eky'okutaano, ekiragiddwa okuba n'ebuvuddeko obulungi mu mirimu gy'ekibinja ebweru w'ekibiina, omusomesa ayagala okuteekateeka enkola ey'omulembe egituukana n'ekigendererwa ky'okukola ebintu "Mu bunene". Mu nkola zino ez'omulembe, engeri ki etuukana n'omutendera gw'okusomesa n'embeera y'abayizi?
answer_a: Weekereza obutonde bw’ensi, mukube ebifaananyi awamu okukola ekibumbe nga musinziira ku kimu ku bintu ebyo, era mubumbe ek块y’ebbumba.
answer_b: Weekebeze obuzimbe obukwetoolodde, kola enteekateeka, era ozimbe ekifaananyi ekiragibwa mu ndagiriro mu bubinja.
answer_c: Laba ebifaananyi by'abakubi b'ebifaananyi ab'omulembe ogwa "impressionist", weekenneenye obuziba bw'ebifo byabyo era obizzeemu okubikola mu ngeri ey'okuzimbulukusa, ng'oyita mu kukolagana.
answer_d: Balambule obutonde bwabwe obwa bulijjo, balonde ekintu era bakikyuse okusinziira ku bwetaavu obupya bwe bakizuulidde wamu ne bannaabwe mu kibiina.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina ky'omwaka ogw'okubiri mu siniya mu somero, mu somo ly'ebivuga eby'ekikungo, ekibinja ky'abayizi kiwuliriza Bolero ya Ravel. Omusomesa alung'amya okuwuliriza okwo eri engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukubisaamu oluyimba olwo olutandika. Mulimu ki ogusinga okuba omutuufu eri abayizi okukulaakulanya okwekenneenya okw'omulamwa ku mulimu oguwuliddwa?
answer_a: Kekkereza akatambi ak'omuziki omukulu omutindo gw'oluyimba kwe gazziddwa.
answer_b: Noonya engeri ennyingo y'amaloboozi gy'ekozeseddwaamu okuleeta amakulu mu mulimu guno
answer_c: Laga engeri omutindo gw’okukola ebintu gye gukwatagana n’ebiseera by’emabega.
answer_d: Enjawulo z'ebikozesebwa ebikozesebwa mu mulimu n'engeri gye bikolamu.

question:
Soma embeera eno wammanga:
Okusobola okuyiga ku bikozesebwa mu kukyusa amaloboozi ag’omulembe era n’okubigezesa, omusomesa w’ebyamuziki asabye abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri okukwata ebigambo by’ebyakasirise. Oluvannyuma abasaba:
- Okukozesa ekivuga (reverb) buli lwe bayogera ku kifo ekinene era ekiggale.
- Okukozesa ebikola ebitaasa amaloboozi ag’omunda (low-pass filters) buli lwe bayogera ku byambalo by’olutalo, bbuga, n’ebyokwerinda.
- Okukozesa ekikankanya oba okukyusa enkula y’amaloboozi (fuzz distortion or waveshaping) buli lwe bayogera ku nkyukakyuka eziri mu bwongo.
Bwe kiba kyetaagisa okukakasa oba abayizi bakozesezza enkola zino buli lwe kyetaagisa, kiki ekikozesebwa ekisinga okuba ekituufu omusomesa ky’asaanidde okukozesa okubakebera?
answer_a: Omutindo gw'okukebera
answer_b: Omutemwa gw'ebyo omuyizi by'akoze
answer_c: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa
answer_d: Omutindo gw'okukeberebwa

question: Soma embeera eno: Abayizi mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu ssomero lya secondary beetegekera okukola omuziki mu lukungaana lw'omuseenene olutegekebwa essomero lyabwe. Omusomesa akwasaganya abayizi mu kwegezaamu 10 okubaawo era alondoola enkulaakulana yaabwe, ng'atunuulira endowooza yaabwe n'obusobozi bwabwe okukola omulimu era n'enkulakulana y'obukugu bwabwe mu kuvvuunula omuziki. Ku bikozesebwa bino wammanga, kiki omusomesa ky'asaanidde okulonda okukola omulimu guno?
answer_a: Omuteeko gw'ebigereeso
answer_b: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa
answer_c: Ekiwandiiko ky'ebifaanaanyi ebikulu
answer_d: Ekiwandiiko ky'amaloboozi n'ebifaananyi

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina ky'Ebyemiziki mu Ssomero Eya Wakati, omusomesa ayagala okukebera buli muyizi kinnoomu ku bukugu bwabwe mu kusoma n'okuwandiika eby'emiziki. Okukola kino, buli muyizi agenda kufuna olupapula lw'obubonero oluliiko oluyimba olumpi era olwangu lwe bataamanyi. Abayizi bagenda kulwetegereza mu bw'ekimpimpi okulusindika eri omusomesa nga balukuba bulungi ku xylophone. Kikozesebwa ki eky'okukebera omusomesa ky'asaanidde okukozesa okutegeeza engeri z'obukugu bw'omuyizi kinnoomu mu kusoma n'okuwandiika eby'emiziki?
answer_a: Omutemwa gw'ebyo omuyizi by'akoze
answer_b: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa
answer_c: Ekiwandiiko ekikwata ku mbeera y'omuyizi.
answer_d: Omutindo gw'okupima

question:
Pulofeesa okuva mu Ssomero lya Middle, mu kitundu 'Mita', alonda ebyokulabirako eby'okuwulira eby'enjawulo abayizi be okuyiga okumanya mita 2/4, 3/4, ne 4/4.
Mu magezi gano wammanga, kiki omuyizi ky'asaanidde okuba nga yamaze okukimanya nga tannayiga kwawula ngeri za mita ez'enjawulo ng'akozesa amatu ge?
answer_a: Omutindo gw'ebigambo
answer_b: Foomu
answer_c: Olulimi
answer_d: Enjogera ennyonnyofu

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu kibiina kya S4, omusomesa alina ekigendererwa ky’okuyigiriza enkola y’okubumba mu by’okubumba ebifaananyi. Okutandika essomo, omusomesa anoonya ekyokulabirako ekiyinza okuyamba okukwataganya enkola y’okubumba n’embeera abayizi ze balimu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Mu mbeera zino wammanga, y’ennene eyinza okusobozesa omusomesa okwoleka enkola y’okubumba?
answer_a: Tegeka jjelitooni.
answer_b: Jjuza eccupa n'amazzi.
answer_c: Teeka ettaka mu kasooli ak'ebimuli.
answer_d: Ggyawo akawunta okuva mu kikolo kyayo.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu ssomero erisookerwako, omusomesa ayagala okukolera awamu n’abayizi ku nkola y’ebibuga ng’asinziira ku ngeri ez’enjawulo ebintu bwe birabika mu bifo bya lukale eby’omukitundu ky’essomero. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisaanira okukozesa okusobola okukolera awamu n’abayizi ku nkola y’ebibuga, okusinziira ku ebyo ebyogeddwa waggulu?
answer_a: Kuba ekifaananyi ky’endabika y’omulyango gw’essomero.
answer_b: TEEKI ebipande ebiraga engeri y'okukuuma n'okukozesa ebintu ebiterekebwa mu bibuga.
answer_c: Ddala eddamu okuteekateeka ekisenge nga kikolerwa okusobola okukijjukiza omuntu n'ebyo by'ayagala era n'ebimweraliikiriza.
answer_d: Teekateeka ebipande nga osinziira ku bye weetegereza ebyetaagisa mu ssomero.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina kya S.6, mu mutwe 'Okunoonyereza ku nnimi z'eby'obukugu ez'omulembe guno', omusomesa ayagala okunnyonnyola abayizi be, ng'ayita mu kikolwa, enkola y'okukola sitensulo. Ku ngeri zino wammanga, engeri ki erimu ekikolwa ekisobola okunnyonnyola enkola eno?
answer_a: Kuba akakomo ku ssente n'ekikomo oluvannyuma okomeleleze.
answer_b: Langi ssente era okubisa ku lupapula.
answer_c: Siga ekkalaamu ku lupapula oluteereddwa ku ssente.
answer_d: Teeka ssente ku lupapula lwe biti era osige okwetoloola.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa ng'ali n'abayizi be ab'omwaka ogusooka mu siniya, ku nkomerero y'essomo eriri ku 'Kusiiga Ebifaananyi ku Bisenge', ayagala abayizi be beekebeere okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino: 'Okwekenneenya ebifaananyi byabwe bye basiize ku bisenge, nga batunuulira enkolagana wakati w'ekigendererwa eky'okwolesa, ebintu ebyakozesebwa, n'olulimi olw'ebyobulamu'. Kiki ekiyinza okukolebwa okusobola okugera okutuukirizibwa kw'ekigendererwa ekyogeddwako waggulu?
answer_a: Basiima ebintu by’olulimi olw’obuwangwa ebikozesebwa mu pulojekiti zaabwe ez’ebifaananyi eby’oku bisenge.
answer_b: Banoonyeereza ebifaananyi byabwe eby'oku bisenge nga basinziira ku mutwe gw'ekigambo, ebintu ebikozeseddwa ebitaaggwaawo, langi, enkula, n'emirongo egiri mu kikungo.
answer_c: Bagezesa ebintu eby'enjawulo okusinziira ku mutwe gw'omulimu gwabwe.
answer_d: Bateekawo emikwano wakati w'ebintu ebikozesebwa ebitali bya bulabe mu pulojekiti n'enkula, ennyiriri, langi, n'emitendera egy'ateesebwa.

question: Mu kibiina ky'omuziki eky'omwaka ogw'omusanvu, omusomesa akola ku quodlibet ey'ebitundu bisatu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuyigiriza ennyimba essatu eri ekibiina kyonna, omusomesa abagabanya mu bibinja bisatu, ng'awa buli kibinja oluyimba lumu. Bwe bamala okutabula ennyimba, omusomesa ateekwa okuyimiriza omuzannyo kubanga ekimu ku bibinja kiba kisinga okugenda mu maaso era quodlibet n'efuuka etaliimu. Kiki ekiyinza okuba ng'ekikolwa ekisinga obulungi omusomesa ky'ayinza okukola okugonjoola ekizibu kino?
answer_a: Buli kibinja kyakukola oluyimba lwakyo abalala basobole okuwulira n’okutegeera ebitundu byonna ebikola oluyimba lwa quodlibet.
answer_b: Ennyimba zigenda kuyimbibwa wamu, naye buli kibinja kirina okussa essira ku ddoboozi lyakyo okusobola okumanya bulungi ekitundu kyalyo, ekyo kigenda okuyamba obutabaawo bibinja byonna ebiyingira ennyimba ezo (quodlibet) nga tebinnatuuka.
answer_c: Ebibinja ebitagenda mu maaso mu nnyingizo ze byonna birikola ennyimba zaabyo ezitegekeddwa waggulu, kale akabinja akagenda mu maaso kasobola okuwuliriza obulungi engeri ennyimba ezo ez'enjawulo gye zikolamu nga bwe bakuba enduulu.
answer_d: Ekibiina kigenda kuwuliriza ebyokulabirako bya quodlibet okusobola okussa essira ku lunyiriri olumu olw'ennyimba oluvannyuma ku lulala. Ebigendererwa biri nti bategeere enkolagana wakati w'amaloboozi n'obukulu bw'okukuuma obungi bw'obudde obwenkana.

question: Mu kibiina kya munaana, mu mutwe “Okweyoleka n’okulongoosa”, abayizi basabiddwa okukola omuziki nga bakozesa ebintu eby’enjawulo eby’olulimi lw’omuziki. Ku nsonga eno, omusomesa agenda kukola omulimu gw’okugezesa n’okutondawo ogw’ekiseera, olwo buli kibinja kibeere n’ebirowoozo ku bitonde byabwe eby’omuziki. Kiki ekiyinza okuba ekikozesebwa ekisinga okuba ekituufu okukozesa okukola omulimu gw’okugezesa n’okutondawo ogw’ekiseera?
answer_a: Omusomesa agenda kuwaawo omuzannyo gw'ebigambo by'omuyimbi, omuli ebintu eby'enjawulo eby'olulimi lw'omuyimbi ebirabika ebisobola okukozesebwa okukola ebiyimba. Mu ngeri eno, ttiimu zijja kufuna ebikozesebwa okutonda ebyazo.
answer_b: Omusomesa agenda kukola omukolo gw’okutonda. Ku lw’omukolo guno, ebika by’ebiwandiiko by’ebiyimba bijja kuggibwa mu nteeka. Buli kimu bwe kirabika, balina okunnyonnyola kika kya bintu bya lulimi lw’ebiyimba ebiyinza okukozesebwa okuvugisa ekika ekyo.
answer_c: Omusomesa agenda kuwa buli kibinja dayisi nnya okuziringisa. Ku buli ludda lwayo, dayisi esooka ejja kubaamu “amaanyi g’amaloboozi”; eya kubiri, “endabika z’ennyimba”; eya kusatu, “engeri z’ennyimba”; eya kuna, “emisinde gy’ennyimba”. Buli kibinja kigenda kukola oluyimba nga kikozesa ebintu bye bafunye bwe baziringisizza buli dayisi.
answer_d: Omusomesa agenda kuwa omukubo gw'ebigambo ogw'ennyimba ogw'ekizungirizi. Gusobola okukolebwa nga bawuliriza ebintu eby'enjawulo eby'omugattiko omusomesa by'agenda okukuba. Oluvannyuma lw'omukubo gw'ebigambo okuggwa, ttiimu zijja kuba n'ebintu eby'enjawulo okusobola okukola ennyimba zaabwe.

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina eky'okutaano, ng'akozesa omutendera Gw'okuwuliriza n'Okusiima, akola omusomo ogw'emirundi egiwerako, ogugenda okumalirizibwa n'omulimu ogugenda okubalirwa okusobola okukebera ekigendererwa "Okwolesa enneewulira, ebirowoozo, n'endowooza eziweebwa ennyimba". Mu biraga by'okukebera bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga ekigendererwa ky'okuyiga ekigguddwawo?
answer_a: Baleeta eri abantu bonna emirimu gye bakola mu kiseera kyonna eky’okusoma.
answer_b: Beeyoleka mu mubiri nga bawuliriza eby'emiziki ebikubirwa n'enyimba.
answer_c: Balaga obuntubulamu mu nnyimba zaabwe nga buli omu ku lwabwe n'abangi.
answer_d: Bayimba era ne bakuba eby'emiziki ebiva mu nsi ez'enjawulo, nga bateeka essira ku bulungi bw'amaloboozi mu nnyimba zaabwe.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’omunaana ayigiriza omuyizi okukozesa obubonero bw’oku kompyuta. Bamaze akaseera nga beenyigira mu kunoonya engeri omubiri gye gwandibadde, okuteeka engalo mu kifo ekituufu, n’okukozesa ekigere ekya ddyo. Omusomesa abadde ayigiriza omuyizi mu ngeri ez’enjawulo era mu biseera eby’enjawulo okusinziira ku ngeri omuyizi gy’akozesezzaamu ekivuga. Mu ngeri zino wammanga, lwaki olaga eky’okulabirako ky’okuddamu okuyigiriza omuyizi okusinziira ku ngeri gy’akozeemu?
answer_a: Kyakusanyusa, okutwalira awamu kirungi nnyo. Olina eddoboozi lirungi, naye tumanyi nti osobola okukola obulungi okusingawo.
answer_b: Jjukira nti engalo bwe ziteekwa okuteekebwa ku nsaasi z’oluyimba luno, ziteekebwa mu ngeri eno: 1-2-3-1-2-3-4-5 era emikono giteekwa okubeera nga gyegololekedde ddala okutuuka ku mubiri.
answer_c: Toggya kigere kyo ku kintu ekinyigirwa ekya ddyo ng'ebbaluwa z'ennyimba bwe ziraga, aleme okubaawo okutabuka kw'amaloboozi mu ngeri etasuubirwa.
answer_d: Ekifo ky'emikono kituufu. Kati ekitusigadde kwe kwegezaamu engeri engalo gye ziteekwa okukozesebwa okutuukiriza oluyimba lwe walonze.

question:
Mu kibiina kya musanvu, mu kugezesa okukolebwa mu bibinja okukwatagana n'omusomo gw'okukuba ebintu ogulina ekigendererwa "Okukuba oluyimba olw'emitindo egy'enjawulo mu kiti ky'obudde ekya 6/8", omusomesa ateekateeka abayizi okutandika omulimu.
Ku bikolwa ebiddirira, kiki ekiraga okuyiga okusuubirwa?
answer_a: Okuzannya polimita mu mita enziggumivu eya ternary
answer_b: Okuzannya ebipimo bya binery ne ternary nga bisukiragana
answer_c: Okuzannya eminyegere egigattiddwa mu mita ennetoolole ebbiri
answer_d: Okuzannya enjawulo mu buwanvu bw'ebitundu by'omuyimbi mu mita ez'ebiri n'ez'essatu

question:
Mu kibiina kya munaana, omusomesa agenda kwanjula abayizi ku nkola y'amaanyi ag'enjawulo mu nnyimba ze bakuba.
Kiki ku bino wammanga abayizi kye bandibadde bamaze okukola okusobola okutegeera ebigenda okusomesebwa?
answer_a: Okutegeera obubonero bw'emisinde gy'ennyimba (Tempo)
answer_b: Okusoma ebigambo mu ngeri etegeerekeka.
answer_c: Okukola obulungi ritardando, accelerando, ne rubato
answer_d: Okunonyereza ku ngeri ebivuga bwe bikola omulimu gwabyo nga bikozesa amaloboozi

question: Mu kukebera okwaakamalirizo mu kibiina kye munaana, mu musomo ogw’okukuba ebivuga ng’ekibiina, ekigendererwa kye kino: “Okutonda n’okuyimba oluyimba olw’ekitundu ekigolokofu,” omusomesa ateekateeka abayizi okwanjula ebyo bye batonze. Ku biragiro bino wammanga eky’okukebera kiki ekiraga nti ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Bakola oluyimba omulodi mwezzirukirwa nga lulina enjawulo ez'enjawulo
answer_b: Bakola oluyimba omutindo gw'amaloboozi gwe guddamu mu ngeri y'emu naye nga ebigambo byawukana.
answer_c: Bakola oluyimba omutendera omupya ogwawukana n’omukulu gwe bagoberera.
answer_d: Bakola oluyimba omuli ekitundu ekiggalawo oba ekitundu ekisembya oluyimba nga kyongerwako ku nnyimba enkulu.

question: Omusomesa w'ekibiina eky'omukaaga, mu kiseera ky'essomo ku mita y'ebivuga, agenda kutandika okukulaakulanya ebyo ebikwata ku mugawulo ogw'okusatu ogw'ekigera ky'ekipimo. Bintu ki abayizi bye balina okuba nga bamaze okubimanya okusobola okukola obulungi ku ebyo bye bagenda okuyiga ebirala?
answer_a: Okutenga n'akazito
answer_b: Ebifaananyi by'emisinde
answer_c: Okutema mu bibiri
answer_d: Omupimo gwa binaali n'omupimo gwa ttenaali

question: Mu kitundu "Okunnyonnyola ennyimba z'omu kibuga", omusomesa asaba omukubi wa bassi mu kibiina okukoppolola oluyimba oluwandiikiddwa okukubirwa n'eggita. Mmanyi ki omuyizi ly'alina okuba alimanyi okusobola okukola omulimu ogwo?
answer_a: Okusoma ennukuta z'ekivuvvuulo kya bass
answer_b: Okusoma akabonero ka treble
answer_c: Okusoma akalambuluzo k'Amerika
answer_d: Okusoma ebbaluwa y'ennanga ya bassi

question:
Mu kibiina kya musanvu, omusomesa atandika omutwe “Okutonda mu Bungi”, ng’alina ekigendererwa “Okukola ebintu ebirabika okuva ku byo omuntu yennyini by’ayagala, ng’agezesa ebintu ebirambika mu kubumba”. Mu ssomero erisooka, omusomesa ayagala abayizi basobole okusiima engeri z’okuzimba ebintu eby’obungi nga bakozesa ebintu ebirambika.
Kiki ekisomesebwa ekisinga okuba ekituufu okusobola okutuukiriza okusiima kw’abayizi ku nkola zino?
answer_a: Vidiyo y’ebintu ebikolebwa nga bikozesebwa okuva mu bintu ebikozeseddwa edda eby’enjawulo.
answer_b: Okulaga ebifananyi by’ebibumbe ebikoleddwa nga bikozesa ebintu ebikozeseddwa edda mu ngeri ey’omulembe.
answer_c: Eno ye ndagiriro y'engeri y'okubajjamu ekibumbe nga tukozesa ebintu ebikozeseddwa edda
answer_d: Ekifaananyi ekiraga engeri omulimu gw'okuzimba ogw'amaanyi gye gukolebwamu nga tukozesa ebintu ebikaddde.

question: Mu mutera gw'essomo “Okubumba n'engeri obutonde bw'abantu gye bulagibwaamu”, mu kibiina kya musanvu, omusomesa akola okukebera okuyamba okumanya obukugu bw'abayizi nga bakola omulimu gw'okubumba ebifaananyi by'abantu. Mu kukebera kuno, omusomesa akizuula nti abayizi balina obuzibu okutegeera amakulu g'okulaga endowooza y'omuntu n'engeri omuntu gy'akozesaamu emikono n'omubiri okumwawula. Ku mirimu egiddwa wano, mulimu ki ogusinga okuba omulungi okukozesa okuyamba abayizi okugonjoola obuzibu buno?
answer_a: Laga ensobi eziri mu ngeri obwenyi gye bulagiddwamu mu birowoozo by'abayizi era obabuulire lwaki zibaddewo.
answer_b: Leeza mu buzibu obuzzeemu okulabika mu bifaananyi ebiraga endowooza y’omuntu era nonnyola emitendera egigoberelwa mu kulambika n’ebipimo ebigendererwa.
answer_c: Tegeka omwoleso gw'ebikozesebwa ebyogera ku ngeri y'okweyoleka era weekenneenye ebirimu ebiraga obuzibu mu bifaananyi by'abakugu abalina amannya.
answer_d: Nnyonnyola mu bujjuvu emiramwa gy’ekigereeso egy’ekitundu ekikwata ku bintu ebiraga endowooza mu byebijagalaggo era olongoose obubonero obukozesebwa okukebera ebintu abayizi bye bazibuwalirwa ennyo.

question: Mu kitundu "Okutondeka ebirabika, omuntu n'obutonde", mu kibiina eky'omunaana, omusomesa ateekawo ekigendererwa "Okutondeka emirimu egirabika nga basinziira ku kusiima n'okwekenneenya eby'obulungi ebikwatagana n'omukwano wakati w'abantu, obutonde n'obwetoolodde." Ng'okukebera okusooka, omusomesa asaba abayizi okulonda omulimu okuva mu byafaayo by'obuyiiya ogulaga omukwano ogwogeddwako. Bw'amala okwekenneenya emirimu, akiraba nti abayizi balina endowooza ntono ku ekyo ekyasabiddwa, kubanga ebifaananyi ebyalondeddwa byoleka butonde bwansi bwokka obw'ettutumu. Nkola ki omusomesa gy'ayinza okukozesa okugaziya endowooza y'abayizi?
answer_a: Londa ebitabo eby'okukozesa ng'ebikulu, birage mu kibiina, era oteese abayizi bakole ekifaananyi nga balowooza ku nkyukakyuka y'obudde.
answer_b: Muwe buli muyizi omulimu ogw'okunoonyerezaako ebintu, bamukolere omulimu ogwo nga bayita mu kukola akakonge, era oluvannyuma weekenneenye ebyavaamu.
answer_c: Muwe buli muyizi ekitabo ekikulu, mutegeke okufumiitiriza ku nkyukakyuka y’obudde, era mubaleetere ekirowoozo eky’obuyiiya ku nsonga eyo.
answer_d: Laga ebitabo eby’okukozesa nga ebyokulambirira, weekubire abayizi okuketta ekitabo, era olung’amye okunoonyereza okw’omuggundu nga mulaga enkolagana wakati w’ekitabo ekyettiddwa n’obusibu bw’obutonde bw’ensi.

question: Mu kibiina kya musanvu, mu kiseera ky’okukulaakulanya omutwe gw’ekyokuyiga “Okutondekawo mu lukalu obuntu bwaffe obw’ennono”, omusomesa atunuulidde ekigendererwa “Okukozesa ebintu n’emisingi gy’olulimi olw’okulaba okusobola okubuunisa obuntu bwaffe obw’ennono”. Okukola kino, asabye abayizi okukola omulimu ogw’okukola ekifananyi nga bayita mu kukozesa ebintu eby’enjawulo, basobole okuteekateeka ekifo ky’ekisenge kyabwe. Omusomesa agenda kukebera ebintu ebyo ng’akozesa akalaga kabonero. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga obulungi okutuukirizibwa kw’ekigendererwa kino eky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Bakozesa ebifananyi ebisaliddwa okuva mu bifo eby'enjawulo okubisaanira nga bwe baagala okukyusaamu ekisenge.
answer_b: Bakola akatabo akalimu ebipande by’ebika by’ebiragala eby’enjawulo okusiiga ku bisenge by’ekisenge.
answer_c: Bakozesa okussa ebifananyi ebitundutundu by’ebintu waggulu na waggulu okubangulula obubanguko bw’ekisenge.
answer_d: Bakozesa tekiniki ya kukoppa na kuklejja okubikka ebifo ebyenjawulo ebikola obwagaagavu bw’ekisenge.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana ali mu kibiina eky’omutendera wakati mu kitundu “Okuteekawo n’Obuyiiya bw’Omulembe,” abayizi gye bakolera ku pulojekiti zaabwe ezikwatagana n’ekigendererwa “Okukola vidiyo eteekeddwawo nga yeesigamiziddwa ku bulamu bw’omuntu.” Abayizi bali mu mutendera gw’okuteekateeka ebirowoozo byabwe, omusomesa by’anaakebera ng’asinziira ku mulamwa. Kiraga ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukozesa mu mulamwa okukebera enteekateeka ya pulojekiti z’abayizi?
answer_a: Bakwata, balonda ebirowoozo, era balongoosa ebintu ebiragibwa n'ebiwulirwa.
answer_b: Bakola enkolagana wakati w’ekigendererwa kyabwe eky’okweyoleka mu mulimu gwabwe n’eky’abo be bakolagana nabo.
answer_c: Bakunganya ekifo kyabwe eky’ekifananyi kya vidiyo, nga balowooza ku bintu ebiri mu kifo we kiri era n’engeri gye kikolagana ne vidiyo.
answer_d: Banannyonnyola engeri gye bagenda okukozesa, nga balowooza ku nkola, ebikozesebwa, engeri, n’engeri gye bakolaganamu n’abalabi

question:
Omusomesa ateekateeka essomo ly'ekibiina eky'omukaaga, ng'ekigendererwa kye kiri "Okukola omulimu ogwesigamiziddwa ku mpisa z'ebyakolebwa ebyomulembe guno."
Kino mu bikolwa bino wammanga kye kisinga okuba ekituufu, ng'entandikwa, abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Kebera emirimu gy'abayizi banno era ogaba endowooza yo.
answer_b: Kola ebifaananyi nga osinziira ku mulamwa oguweereddwa era obilage eri abayizi banne mu kibiina.
answer_c: Londa omulamwa ogw'omulembe guno oguliwo, ogukiikirire ng'okozesa endowooza y'omubiri.
answer_d: Kiki ekintu ky'oyagala okukozesa ebintu ebyabulijjo okukola ekifaananyi ky'ekintu ekyo?

question: Omusomesa mu mwaka ogw’okuna ogw’omutendera gwa siniya akola ku kitundu “Ebikozesebwa eby’ekikugu mu mbeera yaffe ey’obuyimbi”. Emu ku bigendererwa ebitegekeddwa kwe kusomesa abayizi okumanya n’okutegeera engeri z’amaloboozi ez’enjawulo ezikozesebwa ku ddoboozi n’ebivuga (reverb, delay, n’ebirala). Mu ngeri zino wammanga, eyiwa erina obusobozi obusinga okusomesa okusinziira ku kigendererwa omusomesa ky’ateeseteese?
answer_a: Ekintu ekisindikiriza eddoboozi okwewangaza
answer_b: Ekivuga ekya MIDI
answer_c: Pulogulaamu z'okukyusa amaloboozi
answer_d: Ennyimba ez'amaloboozi ezirondeddwa

question: Mu kibiina ky’okusatu mu siniya, mu mutwe gw’ekyokubiri ogwa "Ekibiina Ekikuba Ebivuga", omusomesa ategekategeka amasomo ng’alina ekigendererwa nti abayizi basobola okuteekawo amateeka gaabwe ku bwabwe agakozesebwa okukompoza ennyimba. Mu ngeri y’emirimu egiddibwako abayizi gyebagenda okukola, endi ki esinga okuba entuufu okukolerako okutuuka ku kigendererwa omusomesa kyeyateekawo?
answer_a: Bavumbula ebirowoozo by'endongo ey'omulembe, ne bategeera ebipimo byayo, era ne bateeka ennyimba n'obuwangwa waggulu, nga balonda ebyo ebisinga okusaana omulembe gw'endongo. Oluvannyuma, bakung'aanya oluyimba, ne batereeza ensobi, era ne balaga bannaabwe bye bakoze, abawa ebirowoozo ku byavudde mu nkomerero.
answer_b: Buli omu ayanjula ebirowoozo bye eri abayizi abalala mu kibiina. Balonda ekirowoozo ekisinga okukiikirira ekibiina n’ennyimba ze baagala. Oluvannyuma batendekka era bakikola nga ekibiina. Oluvannyuma lw’ekyo, bakebera ebyavuddemu nga bakola obulungiyizo obw’enkomerero okukyanjula.
answer_c: Baleetawo okusoomoozebwa era ne bakungaanya ebirowoozo ebisoose ebibasobozesa okussa essira n’okuteekateeka engeri omulimu gye gugenda mu maaso. Oluvannyuma, bagezesa era ne bakebera ebikwaata ku maloboozi ng’enteekateeka esooka, gye bakebera, balongoosa, era ne bagabana okuyita mu kubawa endowooza okuva eri bannaabwe n’omusomesa.
answer_d: Bawuliriza omutendera omulonde omusomesa gw’alonze, nga bakebejja ebintu ebigukola. Bageereza ebitundu eby’enjawulo ku bintu byabwe era ne bagukuba, oluvannyuma ne bakozesa omutendera ogwo okukola emikolo gyabwe, nga bassaamu ekitiibwa engeri omutendera ogwo gye gwakolebwamu.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu ssomero lya siniya ateekateeka okukolera awamu n’abayizi ku kumanya enjawulo mu bitundu by’ennyimba ezimanyiddwa nga bayita mu kuwulira. Okukola kino, mu masomo agamu, abayizi bagenda kuwuliriza ennyimba ezirondeddwa era bawandiike mu bukwati bwabwe ebitundu bya buli lumu (olunyiriri, oluyimba oluddwamu, akawungeezi, n’ebirala), ebitundu bye bitegeeza bigenda kuyigirizibwa mu myito gyonna egenda okukolebwa. Bukugu ki obw’okuwulira abayizi bwe balina okuba nabwo okusobola okuyiga ebipya bino obulungi?
answer_a: Wawulaanye enjawulo entono mu nnono z'amaloboozi.
answer_b: Londa enkola y'endongo ey'obuwangwa.
answer_c: Londawo ebiseera eby'ennyimba ebyeddiŋŋana n'ebyenjawulo.
answer_d: Tegeera ebika bya binary

question: Mu kibiina ky’okusatu mu siniya, omusomesa ateekateeka okusomesa essomo ku nkizo y’Afirika mu muziki gw’Amerika. Nga kitundu ku by’okugenda okusomesa, ateekateeka ekigendererwa kino: “Okwekenneenya ebyokulabirako by’omuziki mu Amerika omukono gw’Afirika gwe gusiimwa.” Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gwe gutuukana n’ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Gerageranya engeri z’ennyimba z’Afrika n’eza Mapuche gye zifaanana n’engeri gye zityaanira.
answer_b: Noonyereza ku bintu ebikubibwa ebikolebwa mu nnono z'abantu abaaliwo nga Columbus tannajja.
answer_c: Gambawola ebintu ebikubisa n'okuyimba mu Cumbia ey'e Colombia bifaanana bitya?
answer_d: Koppa empandiika z’engeri z’ebitendero by’amaloboozi ez’enjawulo ezisangika mu Afirika.

question:
Mu kibiina ky'abayimbi, omusomesa ayagala okukwata ku mutwe gw'ekigambo "Enkola z'entunsi ezisobola okukozesebwa mu kifo ky'enkulu mu lukalala lw'ebipimo ebinene".
Kintu ki ku bino wammanga omuyizi ky'alina okuba ng'akimanyi okusobola okutandika okukwata ku mutwe guno?
answer_a: Omutemwa gw'ekitaano
answer_b: Ebbaluwa z'ebitone ez'ekidaala ekikulu
answer_c: Ennyingo eziri mu koodi ezimu
answer_d: Enkyukakyuka ezikolebwa ku kkiyala entono ekwatagana nayo

question:
Omusomesa akola omulimu gw'ekibiina. Omusomesa ayagala okukozesa ebikozesebwa bibiri eby'okukebera. Ekikozesebwa ekisooka kyakukozesebwa mu nkola okurekodiya omutendera ogw'obukozi obw'omulimu obuggweereddwaawo mu buli kibiina, ate ng'ekikozesebwa eky'okubiri kyakukozesebwa ku nkomerero y'omulimu okwongera ku bukugu bw'abayizi okufumiitiriza ku nkulaakulana y'omulimu.

Mu ngeri ki ennungi esinga eyewooza, ebikozesebwa eby'okukebera ebisinga okutuukana n'ebigendererwa by'omusomesa?
answer_a: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa n'akabonero k'omuntu kinnoomu
answer_b: Empapula erimu ebyawandiikibwa eby'obukakafu n'ekipimo ky'omutindo ky'ekibiina
answer_c: Omubuulo ogw’okwekebejja n’okulambika ebikolwa by’abayizi
answer_d: Omutindo gw'okusiima n'ekyokulabirako ekikuyamba okwekebera.

question:
Mu kibiina eky’omwaka ogw’okubiri, omusomesa akwasaganya engeri abayizi gye bakubaamu oluyimba olumu. Bw’atuuka ku kitundu ekiyitibwa ‘Chorus’, akiraba nti abayizi abakuba gitaali y’amasannyalaze tebasobola kukendeeza oba okwongera ku ddoboozi lyayo, ekireetera oluyimba olukulu olukubibwa violin obutawulikika. Omusomesa asalawo okuwa abayizi amagezi aganaabayamba okutereeza engeri gye bakozesaamu eddoboozi.

Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisinga okubaamu okuwa amagezi aganaabayamba okutereeza?
answer_a: Omusomesa asaba abayizi okukola nga tebakozesezza bigere bya piyano (pedal note) mu maanyi ag’enjawulo agali mu katundu k’omuziki okusobola okugategeera n’okugamanya munda.
answer_b: Omusomesa agamba abayizi nti kikulu ennyo endongo ya violin okuwulikika okusinga ebintu ebirala era n’abasaba okukebera obungi bw’amaloboozi gaabwe.
answer_c: Omusomesa ajjukiza abayizi omulamwa gw'amaanyi g'amaloboozi era n'abasaba okunoonyereza ku bunene bw'amaloboozi obwenjawulo bwe basobola okutuukako ku bintu byabwe ebikuba.
answer_d: Omusomesa asaba abayizi okuzuula ekivuga ekirina oluyimba olukulu era n’abakubiriza okukyusa amaanyi okusinziira ku luyimba olwo.

question: Mu ssomero lya siniya ery’okusatu, omusomesa akola omutwe ogw’okuyiga ogukwata ku miziki egiriwo kati. Emu ku bigendererwa bye okuyigiriza kwe kuno: "Okutegeera mu bw’endowooza ne mu kuwulira engeri enzirukanya n’endabika y’oluyimba gye bitegekeddwa." Ku ngeri zino wammanga, eruwa eraga omutindo gw’omuyizi gwe bateekwa okutuukako ogukwatagana n’ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Kutondawo oluyimba olulina ekitundu ekisooka n’ekiddako
answer_b: Okutegeera ebitundu by'oluyimba olwa popu
answer_c: Okwekenneenya engeri ebimuumu bya rondo ebirina emitwe ebiri gye bitegekeddwa.
answer_d: Ategeera engeri enkulu ez’ekitundu ky’omuziki ekikubiddwa nga tekiriko muyimbi.

question: Mu kibiina ky’abalenzi n’abawala abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, omusomesa agenda kutandika omulimu gw’okubumba ng’asinziira ku ngeri ez’omusingi ez’ebinyegenyege by’ebyembiro by’ekyasa ekya 20 eby’amaanyi. Okukola kino, omulimu guno gutandikira ku kukola okunoonyereza ku bigendererwa by’ekikubiiziimu. Bintu ki abayizi bye balina okuba nga bamaze okubimanya okusobola okukola omulimu ogwo?
answer_a: Okutegeera endowooza, nga bwe kyali mu by'obuwangwa bya Renaissance.
answer_b: Ebifaananyi eby'akabonero, eky'enjawulo eri abakugu mu by'emikono ab'ekibiina kya Blue Rider
answer_c: Enkola ey’obuwango bw’endabika, ekintu ekimenyese eky’olulimi lw’ebifaananyi bya Byzantine.
answer_d: Okukyuka okuva mu ngeri y'eby'emisomo ey'okukiikirira ebintu, ekyaliwo mu bakugu b'ekibiina kya Vienna Secession.

question: Mu kibiina ky’abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, mu somo ly’okukuba ebifaananyi (Graphic Design), abayizi bagenda kutandika omulimu ogw’okukuba olupapula olulangirira (poster) okumanyisa abantu b’essomero ku mwoleso gw’ebyamazima ogugenda okubaawo. Okusinziira ku ekyo waggulu, ntegeera ki abayizi ze balina okutegeera okusobola okukola olupapula olwo olulangirira olusabiddwa?
answer_a: Ebifaananyi, omulamwa, akabonero k'ekitongole
answer_b: Omutereeza, ebiwandiiko, ekifaananyi
answer_c: Obuwandiisi bw'ebifaananyi, ebiwandiiko, ebiri mu mboozi
answer_d: Enkola, empandiika y'ennukuta, ebifaananyi

question:
Mu kitundu ky’ekifaananyi mu ssomero ebyokubiri erya siniya, omusomesa ayanjulira abayizi leensi ez’enjawulo ezikozesebwa mu kukwata ebifaananyi ebya analogo okutondeka ebifaananyi, ng’asinga kwetikka ku leensi ey’amaaso g’ekyennyanja. Okuginnyonnyola, abasomera amakulu gayo: “Leensi ey’amaaso g’ekyennyanja erina enkula ey’obugazi bwa 180◦ oba okusingawo, ekisobozesa ebifaananyi okukyama.” Oluvannyuma lw’okusoma, ajja kubalaga ebyokulabirako by’engeri amaaso g’ekyennyanja gye galabika.
Ky’okulabirako ki okuva mu bulamu obwa bulijjo omusomesa ky’ayinza okuwa abayizi okwanguya okutegeera engeri eno?
answer_a: Ekifaananyi ekyolekedde mu ndabirwamu enkovu
answer_b: Ekifaananyi ekirabika mu ggiraasi enzigumu empanvu
answer_c: Ekifaananyi ekirabika mu ndabirwamu mu kintu omuli amazzi
answer_d: Ekifaananyi ekirabika mu ndabirwamu munda mu kijiiko

question:
Mu mwaka ogwokusatu ogw’ekisulo, omusomesa atandika okukolera awamu n’abayizi be ku pulojekiti y’okusiiga ebifaananyi ng’asinziira ku ndowooza y’ebyefuula.

Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukozesa okutuukirira pulojekiti ng’asinziira ku ndowooza eyo?
answer_a: Buuza abayizi ebiteeso oba ensonga ze baagala okusiiga, nga zisinziira ku byo bye baagala n’ebibakubiriza, okukola ku pulojekiti zaabwe.
answer_b: Leeta ekirowoozo ekiragibwa mu kifaananyi ng’entandikwa y’okukulaakulanya omulimu, abayizi okugonjoola n’okukozesa mu pulojekiti zaabwe ez’okusiiga langi
answer_c:
Twebaze: Abayizi, mu pulojekiti zaffe ez’okusiiga, njagala twogere ku ngeri ez’enjawulo ze tuyinza okukozesa okusiiga. Kiki kye muteekereza nti kiyinza okutuyamba okwolesa obulungi bye twagala okusiiga?

Musa: Nze ndowooza nti tuyinza okukozesa engeri y’okusiiga eya ‘layering’, okusiiga ebbala ly’omunnyale ku linna lindi okutuusa ng’omunnyale gwaffe gufuna obuziba bwe twagala.

Leila: Ekyo kirungi Musa, naye ate era ndowooza nti okukozesa ‘palette knife’ kiyinza okutuyamba okufuna ‘texture’ ey’enjawulo mu byetusiiga.

Twebaze: Ezo zombi ngeri nnungi nnyo. Kati, Musa, lwaki olowooza nti ‘layering’ yandibadde nnyangu okukozesa mu pulojekiti yo?

Musa: Nze njagala kulaga ng’eggulu bwe litambula okuva ku bbala erimyufu okudda ku bbala eddamu, era ndowooza nti ‘layering’ y’engeri esinga obulungi okukola ekyo.

Twebaze: Kirungi nnyo. Ate ggwe Leila, lwaki olowooza nti ‘palette knife’ yandibadde nnyangu okukozesa mu pulojekiti yo?

Leila: Nze njagala kulaga engeri ebimera gye bikulamu, era ndowooza nti ‘palette knife’ yandimpadde ‘texture’ ey’enjawulo okukola ekyo.

Twebaze: Kale, ekyo kirungi nnyo. Kati, mulowooza nti engeri endala ze tuyinza okukozesa okusiiga ze ziri zitya?

Aisha: Nze ndowooza nti tuyinza okukozesa ‘dry brushing’ okufuna ebintu ebifaanana ng’ebikalu.

Twebaze: Aisha, ekyo kirungi nnyo. Kati, mulowooza nti engeri zino zisobola zituyamba okwolesa obulungi bye twagala okusiiga?

Abaana: Yee, zisobola.

Twebaze: Kale, mutandike okukozesa engeri zino mu pulojekiti zammwe, era mundeetere ebyo bye mukoze.
answer_d: Tegeeza abayizi okunoonyereza ku muzisi omukugu gwe baagala, nga balaga engeri ebifaananyi bye bye bikolebwa, oluvannyuma babikozese mu pulojekiti zaabwe ez’okusiiga ebifaananyi.

question: Mu kibiina ky’abana mu siniya, mu mutwe "Okunoonyereza ku nnimi ez’ekyama n’ez’amasannyalaze: Ebifaananyi bya vidiyo", omusomesa agenda kukolera wamu n’abayizi ku kiruubirirwa kino: okutegeera ebintu ebikulu ebikola engeri eno ey’okwolesa ebirowoozo. Mu bintu bino eby’omugaso omusomesa by’ayinza okukozesa, kiki ekiyinza okumusobozesa okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa ky’ekibiina?
answer_a: Laga vidiyo eraga engeri omulimu gwa Spiral Jetty, ogwa Robert Smithson, gye gwazimbwaamu.
answer_b: Laba vidiyo z’ebyo Marina Abramovic by’akoze era olyoke obyekenneenye wamu n’abayizi.
answer_c: Leeta omulimu gw’ebyemisono ogwa Juan Downey oluvannyuma omwekennenye wamu n’abayizi.
answer_d: Leetawo filimu ennyonnyola obulamu n'emirimu gya Bill Viola

question: Mu butonde bw'essomo "Ensonga z'Abavubuka n'Eby'emikutu gy'Empuliziganya egya Mulembe", erisomesebwa mu kibiina eky'okubiri, omusomesa ateekateeka okusomesa abayizi ku nkola y'okukuba ebifaananyi nga bayita mu 'stencil' oluvannyuma bakozese enkola eyo mu mulimu ogw'okusiiga ebifaananyi ogulina okusinziira ku birowoozo byabwe. Okukola kino, omusomesa asalawo okukozesa obuyambi mu by'enjigiriza obusobola okwanjulira abayizi enkola eno gyebayogeraako. Ku ngeri zino wammanga, lwaki olwo oluwa oluteesa obuyambi mu by'enjigiriza obwandikwataganye n'ekigendererwa ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Ekifananyi ekyazimbiddwa nga kikozesa sitensilo
answer_b: Vidiyo ekwata ku nkola Keith Haring ze yakozesa mu bikolwa bye.
answer_c: Ebyafaayo ebikwata ku mulimu n'enkola omukubi w'ebifaananyi TAKI 183 gy'akozesa.
answer_d: Okutendekebwa ku bikolwa by'abayimbi abakolebwa mu luguudo nga bakozesa omuze gwa "wild style"

question: Oluvannyuma lw’okusiima obulungi bw’ebifaananyi ebyakolebwa mu mutindo gwa "geometric abstraction movement", okwekenneenya ebyafaayo byabyo, n’okubyekenneenya nga tulaba, omusomesa awa abayizi be ekiragiro kino: "Mukole ebifaananyi ebiwerako, ng’endowoza, mwe muloopa ennyiriri ezitaliiko makulu, nga musinziira ku kulonda ekintu ekikulu, nga mugatta ekirowoozo kyo ku omu ku bakubi b’ebifaananyi be twalabye." Ekitundu ki ku mutendera gw’ekyokulabirako ekikyuka-kyuka ogw’enkola y’obutondefu ekiragiro ky’omusomesa kino kye kikwatagana nakyo?
answer_a: Londa engeri ey’omulembe ey’okulwanyisa obwavu mu kitundu kyo. Gamba, oyinza okukola bizinensi empya, okutandikawo omukutu oguyamba abantu, oba okukola ekintu ekirala kyonna ekiyamba okukyusa embeera z’abantu. Laga engeri gy’okukozesa obusobozi bwo okukola enjawulo.
answer_b: Lowooza ku nkola eno era ogessemu ebirowoozo.
answer_c: Tegeka omulimu ogugenda okukolebwa.
answer_d: Nnyanjula ekirowoozo ekisooka.

question: Mu kibiina kya S.1, okukulaakulanya eby'okuyiga ebikwata ku kufooka, omusomesa aleeta ebifaananyi ebiraga engeri ez'enjawulo omuntu gy'asobola okukwatiramu ebifaananyi n'enkola y'okubitegeka. Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza n'okwekenneenya ebifaananyi ebyo, asaba abayizi okukola omulimu ogwo nga bakwata ebifaananyi mu bifo eby'enjawulo okwetooloola essomero. Omulimu guno gunaakeberwa mu ngeri ey'okubalongoosa nga bakozesa akabonero akalaga obukugu. Nga tutunuulidde omulimu oguweereddwa, ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiruwa ekisaana okuteekebwa mu kikozesebwa?
answer_a: Bakozesa empiso ez’enjawulo n’enkulungo okusinziira ku bigendererwa byabwe bye baagala okwolesa.
answer_b: Bakizuula engeri engeri n'enkula z'embalaasi mu by'obuyonjo by'essomero.
answer_c: Bakozesa empiso ez'enjawulo n'enkola mu bifaananyi byabwe.
answer_d: Bano bategeera ebika bya engelo ne fuleemu ezikozesebwa mu nkola y'ebifaananyi byabwe

question:
Mu kibiina ky’omwaka ogw’okuna mu siniya, omusomesa akola ku ngeri Edvard Munch gye yakozesanga ebifaananyi. Okusobola okuyigiriza kino, asaba abayizi be okukola ekifaananyi ekiraga ekintu nga basinziira ku kino, era nga kigenda kukeberwa nga bakozesa akalango akalina ebintu bye balina okukola.
Mu ngeri eziddwamu wammanga, lwaki olwo lukulu okuba mu kalango ako?
answer_a: Akakozesa langi okukola ebintu ebirabika obulungi
answer_b: Akakozesa langi ez'amaanyi era ennungi okukyusa endabika y'ebintu
answer_c: Akakozesa enjawulo wakati w'ekitangaala n'ekisiikirize okubumba ebintu.
answer_d: Okukozesa ekifaananyi n'ettaka okutuukiriza obuziba bw'embeera y'obudde

question: Ku mutendera gwa Nursery, omusomesa agenda kwetegereza ekigendererwa ky'okuyiga: “Okulaga okwagala mu ngeri y’ebintu ebikwatika, ng’addamu okuyita mu ngeri ez’enjawulo, gamba ng’okwogera nga omwana omuto, ebikolwa, okumwenya, n’ebirala”, okuva mu mutima gw’ennimi ez’obuyiiya. Okukola kino, ateeka ebipande eby’enjawulo ebibikkiddwa ebintu ebikwatika mu kisenge abaana basobole okubinoonyerezaako. Oluvannyuma lw’akaseera, omwana anoonyeza ku kintu era atandika okuddamu. Omusomesa amusemberera era akkirira ku mutendera gw’omwana. Okusinziira ku mbeera ennyonnyoddwa, kwe kulonda ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukola okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: “Obuweweesi ki bw’okutte ku kibaawo kino? Ekyo kiweweevu ate kino kikakanyavu. Kiruwa ky’oyagala okutwala?”
answer_b: “Wabaagalidde ebintu bye nnakulekerawo? Oyagala okukwatako ekirala? Osobola okukituukako? Nja kukisembeza gy’oli.”
answer_c: Oli mukukwata bulooka ezirina obuwaze, akamwenyumwenyu ko kandaga nti okyasinza obuwaze obugonda. Eno njerere, oyagala okugikwatako?
answer_d: Ono okutte ku bulooka obulina obuwaze, obwagala? Oyagala okukwata ku bulooka omulala? Ggukwate mu ngalo zo. Owogedde obuwogeezi, kirungi nnyo!

question: Omusomesa mu ssomero ly'abaana abato agenda kukola ku kigendererwa ky'okuyiga: "Okunnyonnyola ennyimba, ng'akozesa ebintu eby'enjawulo omuli eddoboozi, omubiri, ebivuga, n'ebintu ebirala," okuva mu mutwe gw'Ennimi z'Obuyiiya. Kulaga ki okuva eri abaana okwandiyolesezza nti ekigendererwa kino kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Kola ebyokunyega omubiri nga ogoberera emisinde gy'ennyimba
answer_b: Okuzina nga weekozesa ebikolwa n'emigendo okusinziira ku maanyi g'omuziki.
answer_c: Kuba akanyigirizi k'omusaayi wamu nga mukozesa ebivuga eby'enjawulo.
answer_d: Muyimbe ennyimba ez'enjawulo nga mukuba omukono era nga munyeenya omutwe okukwata entindo.

question: Omusomesa ow’abaana abato alina ekigendererwa kino eri abaana: "Okunnyonnyola endowooza zaabwe n’enneewulira zaabwe ku bikolwa by’obuyiiya eby’enjawulo."
